title: Client Solutions Manager, Retail & Ecom - Global Business Solutions - Stockholm
description:
**Responsibilities**
 Client Solutions are the trusted advocates connecting key stakeholders, providing inspiration and insights, driving collaboration that translate into long term client partnerships and growth! We are responsible for the day to day relationship and for ensuring success of advertiser investment. As trusted partners, we proactively advise our clients of opportunity and solutions to exceed their expectations, securing future investment.
   

  

 We are currently looking for a highly skilled and motivated Client Solutions Manager to help scale our growing advertising business. The Client Solutions Manager is a key member of the Advertising Team, working with sales, product, and other business partners to analyse and improve advertisers’ performance on TikTok, in support of their marketing initiatives. They will work with our unique data and translate it into high-quality and actionable insights and recommendations to improve the effectiveness of advertiser campaigns and unlock business opportunities. Day to day, their activities include analysing metrics of success for businesses in the team, developing data-driven insights and recommendations, and communicating recommendations in a clear and compelling fashion.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

 - Lead lower-funnel media strategy, planning, and campaign execution to meet client business goals.
   

 - Manage and grow post-sale advertiser relationships through consultative business reviews and collaboration with sales.
   

 - Drive adoption of TikTok’s auction platform and tools, offering technical support and real-time performance analysis.
   

 - Support pre-sale efforts with research, pitch development, and cross-functional collaboration.
   

 - Educate internal and external stakeholders via training sessions, documentation, and whitepapers.
   

 - Define and oversee measurement strategies, including advanced solutions like Conversion Lift Studies, to generate actionable insights.
   

 - Analyze and optimize campaign performance, providing data-driven recommendations and platform feedback to product teams.
   

 - Present insights and performance results in a clear, consultative manner to drive client success.
   

 - Demonstrate deep analytical ability, and develop great expertise in TikTok’s proprietary metrics, working to constantly evolve how we analyse and communicate data driven insights to our advertisers
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Minimum Qualifications:
   

 - Demonstrated experience of account management/performance experience in digital marketing
   

 - Knowledge and understanding of tracking, attribution and measurement (Pixel, Events API (CAPI), MMM, MTA, MMP, SKAN etc)
   

 - Tangible experience executing on a biddable network
   

 - Experience managing brand advertisers with a deep understanding of their challenges across full funnel objectives
   

 - Ability to analyse data and identify insights to assess campaign performance
   

  

 Preferred Qualifications:
   

 - Results oriented with high attention to detail and strong organisational skills
   

 - Proactive attitude with excellent project management, organisational, and analytical skills
   

 - Strong verbal and written communication skills, ability to effectively translate technical language to non-technical stakeholders
   

 - Experience diagnosing and solving technical problems with product and engineering teams
   

 - Experience using Excel or Google Sheets essential, familiarity with visualisation tools
   

 - Comfortable presenting complex analysis in a simple, easy to digest way to C-suite level stakeholders
   

  

**About TikTok**
 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.​
   

  

  

**Why Join Us**
 Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day.​
   

 We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.​
   

 ​
   

 Diversity & Inclusion​
   

 TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.​

title: Design Engineer exterior light
description:
**🚀 Join VIPAS AB as a Design Engineer exterior light🚀**
**Are you ready to thrive in the dynamic world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB is on the lookout for passionate, driven professionals to join our growing team and take on exciting new projects across Sweden.**
 🌟 About VIPAS AB
   

  

 At VIPAS AB, we believe technology should empower businesses—not complicate them. We’re an IT consulting company that delivers smart, scalable, and tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java, Python, and Cloud platforms. Our expertise spans: Software Development, DevOps & Automation, Embedded Systems, Manufacturing Enginering, Mechanical Enginering, Android & Mobile Solutions, Project Management & Engineering and so on.
   

  

 We’re not just consultants—we’re strategic partners guiding organizations through digital transformation with confidence and clarity.
   

  

 💼 Your Role
   

  

 As a Consultant at VIPAS AB, you’ll work on Exterior Light to join our client's team in Gothenburg. You will be part of the Visibility HW team, which is responsible for the development of components such as exterior lighting, wiper and washer systems and rearview mirror systems for heavy vehicles.
   

  

 This is an assignment where you will work in a central role with a strong focus on quality, legal requirements and technical development, in close collaboration with both internal and external stakeholders.
   

  

**About The Assignment**
 As a Design Engineer for Exterior Light, you will work together with the Lead Engineer and other functions within R&D, design, production, homologation and suppliers. Your responsibility is to ensure that the front lights meet requirements for design, function, legislation and integration into the vehicle.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Write technical requirements and perform review of suppliers' technical specifications (RTS).
* Participate in requirements setting and technical discussions with both internal and external stakeholders.
* Ensure quality and regulatory compliance for components and the entirety of the vehicle.
* Provide technical input to product design and project strategy.


**Requirements:**
* University degree in mechatronics or mechanical engineering.
* Several years of experience in Exterior Light in vehicle development.
* Experience in Supplier Involvement in complex systems and requirements.
* Good habit of global communication and networking.
* Understanding of requirements documentation (TR writing) and legal requirements.
* Documented knowledge in Catia V5.
* Knowledge in SAFe/Scrum.
* Very good knowledge of English, both spoken and written


**Merits:**
* Knowledge of Volvo Trucks' internal systems.
* Driving license B and C.
* Experience in vehicle development in general.
* Knowledge of Swedish, oral and written.


 🌟 Why VIPAS AB?
   

  

 At VIPAS AB, we don’t just offer jobs—we build careers. Here’s why top IT professionals choose us:
   

  

* 📄 Secure & Transparent Employment We follow the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement, ensuring fair compensation, benefits, and long-term stability.
* 🌍 Diverse Industry Exposure Work on high-impact projects across Telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking, gaining experience that spans multiple sectors.
* 🚀 Accelerated Career Growth Whether you're a seasoned developer or an emerging tech leader, we offer continuous learning, challenging assignments, and leadership opportunities to help you grow fast and grow smart.
* 🤝 Culture of Collaboration & Curiosity Join a team that values innovation, inclusion, and integrity. At VIPAS, your ideas matter, your voice is heard, and your growth is celebrated.


 📬 How to Apply
   

  

 Ready to make an impact? Send your
 **resume and cover letter.** 
 We review applications continuously—so don’t wait!
   

  

 ⚠️
 **Note** 
 :
 **Only candidates with Sweden PR/citizenship or a valid work permit will be considered.**
 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. So, if a role speaks to you, apply immediately!

title: Corporate Communications Manager
description:
**Job Description**
 As a
 **Corporate Communication Manager** 
 you will lead and execute the company's external corporate communication as well as the internal communications, ensuring our messaging aligns with business and brand objectives, collaborating with stakeholders throughout the global organization. You will be responsible for internal communications and external corporate communications, including media relations. You will report to Head of Brand & Marketing and collaborate cross-functionally with diverse teams.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead and execute external corporate communication and internal communications strategies
* Ensure messaging aligns with business and brand objectives
* Manage proactive and reactive media relations
* Handle crisis and brand reputation issues
* Craft messaging for areas such as Sustainability, Expansion, HR, Customer Service, and Social Media
* Support and train brand spokespeople and collaborate closely with the Managing Director
* Work with H&M Group central communications team to ensure compliance with group policies.


**Who You’ll Work With**
 You will collaborate with the Head of Brand & Marketing and work cross-functionally with diverse teams across the global organization. You’ll also partner with the H&M Group central communications team and key stakeholders in various departments.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with…
   

  

* 8–10 years of experience in corporate communications, public relations, or related fields within a global organization
* Proven expertise in media relations, crisis management, and internal communications
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Proficient in English, both written and spoken
* Experience in change management and communications
* Strong strategic, planning, and organizational skills
* Ability to work both proactively and reactively.


 And people who are…
   

  

* Strategic thinkers with a hands-on approach
* Collaborative and solution-oriented
* Able to balance holistic perspectives with attention to detail
* Passionate about the fashion industry
* Comfortable in a fast-paced, dynamic environment


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **full-time permanent** 
**position** 
 based at our Head Office in Stockholm.
   

  

 If you feel this opportunity is exciting, feel free to apply by sending in your
 **CV and Portfolio in English** 
 as soon as possible, but no later than
 **9th Sep 2025** 
 . Due to data policies, we only accept applications through our career page.
   

  

**Please note:** 
 We may take down the ad before the deadline if we receive a high volume of qualified applications, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.
   

  

 In this role, you will have the flexibility to work both remotely and from the office. While remote working is part of our offer, approx. 4 days per week office presence is required to foster strong collaborations and teamwork.
   

  

 Please note this position is offered on a local contract, therefore you should have the legal right to work in Sweden before applying. Other candidates are welcome to register their interest, and we will keep you in mind for future opportunities.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 & Other Stories offers fashion-loving women a wide range of shoes, bags, accessories, beauty and ready-to-wear – all equally important for the whole look. We inspire women to create their own personal style and expression. Our ateliers design diverse collections with great attention to detail and quality, always with modern femininity in mind. Learn more about & Other Stories here.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 We offer all our employees attractive benefits with broad development opportunities. All our employees receive a staff discount usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to this, &Other Stories based colleagues also receive:
   

  

* 30 days holiday
* A collective agreement which includes pension and life insurance
* Wellness benefit 3000kr/year
* Benify Benefits Portal


**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Software Engineers to Zalando
description:
**About The Company And The Role**
 We are looking for two Software Engineers to join Zalando, an international e-commerce company that is shaping the future of retail. This company provides a platform that serves millions of customers worldwide and is now expanding its engineering team to continue delivering innovative solutions. Here, you’ll have the chance to work with technologies such as Java, Kotlin, AWS, PostgreSQL, and Elasticsearch, all while collaborating with passionate teams focused on driving innovation.
   

  

 In the role of Software Engineer, you’ll develop and operate large-scale systems that ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment. Your primary focus will be to build backend applications that handle high volumes of data and deliver seamless experiences for customers and partners.
   

  

 At Zalando, you’ll be part of a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning. This role offers you the chance to contribute to an innovative, customer-centric organization that is reshaping the future of online retail.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Developing and maintaining high-performance, low-latency systems for data streaming and processing.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and scale solutions for fulfillment and customer experience.
* Taking ownership of applications, managing them from development through deployment and monitoring.
* Innovating and finding solutions to scale the platform in an increasingly complex ecosystem.
* Actively contributing to the development of new features and improvements.


 You’ll contribute to Zalando’s success by ensuring the systems you build directly enhance the customer experience. As a Software Engineer, you’ll be challenged by the complexity of building distributed systems at scale and will have the opportunity to collaborate across teams and countries.
   

  

**We Believe You Have**
* A relevant degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* Professional experience in software engineering.
* Solid experience with Java or Kotlin and building APIs.
* Familiarity with databases (e.g., PostgreSQL) and event-driven architectures.
* Some experience or interest in AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch.
* A passion for problem-solving and building scalable solutions.
* Strong communication skills in English (written and spoken).


**It’s a Bonus If You Have**
* Experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Kubernetes) and distributed systems.
* Knowledge of Kafka or similar messaging systems.
* Experience working with large-scale, high-availability systems.


 We are looking for candidates who are proactive, innovative, and motivated to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
   

  

 Other information
   

  

 Start date: As soon as possible
   

  

 Scope: Full-time position (100%)
   

  

 Location: Stockholm.
   

  

 Selection process: We apply continuous selection, which means the position may be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or the recruitment process, feel free to contact the responsible recruiter Ronja Bergman on ronja.bergman@techtalents.se
   

  

 Does this sound like the position for you? We look forward to hearing from you – warmly welcome with your application!
   

  

 In this recruitment, Zalando is collaborating with Tech Talents, and we direct applications to Tech Talents.

title: Consulting Solutions Executive
company_industry: Software Development and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Meet Our Team**
 As part of Pegasystems' consulting organization, the Consulting Solution Executive has responsibilities of the professional services business development & contracting process, advising on Pega Success and maintaining C-class or senior management engagement for delivery success. The team makes a key contribution in driving License sales success in collaboration with the broader go-to-market organisation.
   

  

**Picture Yourself At Pega**
 This is a high-profile and demanding role, requiring a combination of analytical skills, thought leadership, project/ process management, and cross-functional collaboration skills. This role is designed to help Pega grow its software and services business; provide high quality services to its clients, partners and employees; and help develop a delivery infrastructure for rapid growth. This role will be working with several high profile and complex client engagements.
   

  

**What You'll Do At Pega**
* Lead work efforts, execute and grow Consulting billings across designated vertical with high profile and complex clients
* Achieve annual quota license by supporting software sales of our insert vertical.
* Advocate during the sales process for best practice delivery approach to be followed on all Pega projects.
* Lead the efforts to define, scope, size and propose new Pega application implementations to clients
* Provide field feedback to the product management and engineering teams responsible for Pega applications
* Develop and maintain deep client contacts as assigned.
* Achieve and maintain assigned Certifications and needed credentials.


**Who You Are**
 You have proven experience in professional services business development, as well as experience selling or implementing adjust for vertical. You are a natural, fast-paced learner able to turn out solutions of your own initiative, and you are comfortable positioning yourself as an educator equipped to offer large accounts practical solutions to relevant industry problems. You can speak with confidence and clarity and can hold gravitas in conversations with C-suite executives or VPs of Marketing. This is a position for someone who is a goal-driven, challenge-seeking performer.
   

  

**What You've Accomplished**
* BA/BS (Business or Technical Degree preferred)
* 10+ years of experience in a professional services business development role
* Proven to be successful in defining and contracting consulting engagements including the selling process
* Multi stakeholder management.
* Ability to persuade and influence, using appropriate interpersonal styles and communication methods to gain acceptance of thoughts, plans, activities, services and products
* Ability to achieve role based Pega certifications
* Ability to complete Industry Specific Training as required


**Pega Offers You**
* Gartner Analyst acclaimed technology leadership across our categories of products
* A very strong ambitious high performing team
* Continuous learning and development opportunities
* An innovative, inclusive, agile, flexible, and fun work environment
* Competitive global benefits program inclusive of pay plus bonus incentive & employee equity in the company

title: Senior Manager - Digital Strategy and IT Operating Model within Management Consulting
description:
**About The Role**
 As a Senior Manager in Technology Strategy & IT Operations within Management Consulting at KPMG, you will play a pivotal role in guiding our clients through their digital transformation journeys. You will leverage your expertise in digital strategy, IT operating models, and technology transformation to help clients achieve their business objectives. This role requires a deep understanding of digital technologies, strategic thinking, and the ability to contribute and lead complex projects.
   

  

 Your impact, adaptability and growth mindset matter as much as your years in the field. You will take on client solution development and project delivery leadership. You will contribute actively to practice building, growth, mentoring and thought leadership.
   

  

 The role can be placed in Stockholm or Gothenburg, depending on your location and preference.
   

  

**Our Fields of Engagement**
* Digital Strategy Development: Collaborate with clients to develop comprehensive digital strategies that align with their business goals and objectives. This includes assessing current digital capabilities, identifying opportunities for improvement or developing futuristic roadmaps for digital transformation
* IT Operating Model Design: Design and implement future ready IT operating models that enhance efficiency, scalability and agility. This involves defining organization model, governance and steering model for IT, Business-IT Alignment, IT processes, Service delivery efficiency, performance KPIs and roles that complement client's digital strategy
* IT Strategic Sourcing: Analyze and optimize IT sourcing strategy, supplier landscape and IT spend to ensure value for money. This involves conducting cost-benefit analysis, benchmarking, reviewing supplier performance and identifying opportunities for cost savings. Additionally, support client with complex and strategic sourcing initiatives (RFx process)
* CIO advisory: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients Tech/IT leadership acting as a trusted advisor. Understand CxO business and IT challenges and provide tailored and optimal solutions, insights
* Thought Leadership: Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies. Contribute to thought leadership by presenting at conferences, and participating in industry forums and developing articles, point of views and surveys


 ,
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in information technology, Business Administration, or a related field
* Minimum of 10+ years of relevant experience in Digital/Technology strategy, IT Operating model, IT Service delivery and Steering Model transformation, cost transformation, or Technology transformation roles
* Experience from top-tier consulting firms or large enterprises is preferred
* Deep understanding of cloud strategy and cloud transformation, emerging technologies (AI, Gen & Agentic AI, Modern Data platforms) or IT infrastructure & IT operations
* Understanding of Enterprise Architecture concepts, Industry leading platforms across functions (e.g. ERP, CRM, CPQ, e-commerce, Supply chain & Logistics, Data Platforms)
* Proven experience in leading complex projects and delivering high-quality results under tight deadlines
* Proven experience in sales within a consulting environment including identifying business opportunities, developing proposals and driving business growth
* Curious with attitude of continuous learning
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Proactive, entrepreneurial and collaborative mindset
* Excellent stakeholder management skills. Comfortable in engaging with CxO level stakeholders in dynamic and high impact situation.
* Proficiency (written and spoken) in Swedish will be considered plus


**Why Join KPMG**
* Global Network: Be part of a global network of professionals and gain access to international projects and knowledge sharing
* Career Development: Benefit from continuous learning and development opportunities, including training courses, mentorship programs, and career progression pathways
* Inclusive Culture: Work in an inclusive and diverse environment where everyone's ideas and contributions are valued
* Impactful Work: Make a lasting, positive impact on clients and society through meaningful and challenging work


 At KPMG, we are committed to fostering a culture of integrity, excellence, and collaboration. We believe in empowering our people to make a positive impact on our clients, communities, and society. Our values guide our actions and help us achieve our vision of being the preferred insights-led professional services firm.
   

  

 If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for digital transformation and a commitment to excellence, we invite you to join our team at KPMG and help us shape the future of our clients' businesses.
   

  

**Make a difference with us?**
 We welcome and look forward to receiving your application also during the summer, the selection process will begin at the start of August.
   

  

 If you have any questions, please contact Marie-Louise Bååth, marie-louise.baath@kpmg.se

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet av att bygga data pipelines i Snowflake
* Datamodellering och kostnadsoptimering i Snowflake
* Modellering av OLAP-modeller (3NF)
* Minst 4+ års erfarenhet av cloud-produkter, varav minst 2+ år specifikt med Snowflake


**Meriterande**
* Andra molnplattformar
* dbt, Python
* Orkestreringsverktyg för molnplattformar
* SQL Server, SQL Analysis Services Tabular
* BI-utveckling i Power BI


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 05-09-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: System Architect
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Spectator Sports, and Entertainment Providers
description:
**Own the architecture and technical strategy of the infrastructure platform that enables our global sports-tech system, deployed in thousands of locations worldwide** 




  





**WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE GOLF?** 




  





**Our mission** 
 is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our product brings people together and encourages them to get active which enables a healthier lifestyle. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people spend their quality time bonding and playing with their family and friends. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥
 



  





**At our new office** 
 , you can expect to meet humble, helpful and driven colleagues. You will join an organization where everyone has a voice and can make an impact. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to something meaningful as we undergo exciting changes and growth. We are committed to creating an environment where you can grow professionally and individually. As well as creating a social work environment by creating fun activities like morning fika, gym sessions, mob programming, after-work, table tennis, and golf simulator sessions to name a few! 🥳 🏓 ☕️
 



  





**We are proud** 
 to be on a journey where we're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our newly renovated R&D office in Stockholm, Sweden. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
 



  





 At our R&D office we have 150+ people building everything from circuit boards, metal frames and mechanics to algorithms, image processing, apps, and games. Our development spans from nuts and bolts to the cloud and 3D games. We develop our own cameras, design electronics, and create experiences that blend physical interaction with digital interfaces.
 



 In this role, you’ll have the chance to work across that full spectrum. This gives you the chance to influence the whole product development process - from idea to execution - and not just the implementation. Join an experienced team that influences infrastructure, hardware, software, and system design—without owning production code.
 



 We’re looking for a Technical Leader to own the architecture and technical strategy of the infrastructure platform that enables our global sports-tech system, deployed in thousands of locations worldwide. Our system powers high-performance golf ball tracking using custom cameras, embedded compute, edge servers, and cloud-connected infrastructure.
 



 You will lead the architecture and integration of hardware components from external vendors with our in-house developed software and hardware systems. These systems must perform consistently in real-world environments that are often unpredictable and beyond our control
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Define and maintain technical architecture and integration strategy for third-party hardware.
* Ensure vendor systems meet requirements for environmental robustness and software compatibility.
* Align configuration, monitoring, and deployment models across edge components.
* Shape how we build and scale installations (“sites”) as reliable, networked systems in the field.
* Influence infrastructure, software configuration, and system design—without writing production code.



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* Background in embedded or hardware-near system design and architecture.
* Experience working with Linux environments.
* Past experience as a developer working in an agile environment using iterative approaches.
* Hands-on experience with field-deployed systems involving complex interactions between networking, computing, and interface components.
* Proven ability to collaborate across engineering disciplines and vendors.
* Skilled in balancing cost, durability, and complexity in system integration.
* Strong communication skills and a structured, clarity-driven approach.
* Experience working with hardware vendors and manufacturers, from specification to validation.



  





**Bonus competencies** 




 Experience evaluating trade-offs between embedded, FPGA-based, and general-purpose computing with cost-efficiency and reliability in mind.
 



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




 We value fully engaged associates who come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all the colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range near your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence.
 



  





**Activities** 



* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Stockholm. We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Customer Technology Advisor - Application Services (Nordics)
job_function: Sales, Business Development, and Customer Service
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 Join our dynamic team as a Customer Technology Advisor and become an integral part of our cutting-edge Go-To-Market team. As a certified expert in your field, you will be at the forefront of revolutionizing technology solutions for our valued customers. Working hand in hand with our Kyndryl Consult Partners and customer partners, you will leverage your technical and solution expertise to drive targeted opportunities and exceed customer expectations.
   

  

 In this role, you won't just be another advisor; you will be a trusted ally and visionary, delivering unique and differentiated value to our customers. Through captivating show-and-tell methods such as engaging demos and compelling presentations, you will showcase our credibility and eminence in the industry, leaving a lasting impression on potential customers.
   

  

 As a vital member of our team, you will support Consulting, Advisory, and Architecture activities across Sales, Pre-Sales & Delivery, collaborating closely with Customer Partners and Kyndryl Consult Partners. With your extensive technical knowledge and mastery of the practice-specific domain, you will bring together the breadth of Kyndryl's expertise to develop profitable deals that drive our success.
   

  

 Your dedication to continuous improvement and your passion for our practice will shine through as you showcase your end-to-end knowledge of the domain you align with, as well as the associated subdomains. Your technical prowess, backed by your external certifications, will establish you as a true authority in your field.
   

  

 As a Customer Technology Advisor, you will possess strong technical and business acumen, allowing you to provide value driven solutions within the practice services domain(s). Your exceptional customer facing skills, combined with your articulate communication style and interpersonal finesse, will enable you to effortlessly convey the technical benefits of Kyndryl's capabilities, perfectly matching the unique needs of each customer.
   

  

 As a strategic thinker, you will identify the intricate business and technical requirements of our customers, leveraging the vast capabilities of Kyndryl to generate winning cross-practice solutions. Your ability to develop and deliver compelling demonstrations, proof of concepts, and prototypes will clearly demonstrate the tangible value our offerings bring to our customers, leaving them eager to partner with us.
   

  

 In addition to your technical expertise, you will also take the lead in coordinating the entire pre-sales process, ensuring quality and compliance verification while adhering to Kyndryl best practices. Your collaboration with internal and external stakeholders will generate winning responses and create optimal technical solutions. Moreover, you will actively build and nurture relationships with our external alliance partners, fostering a collaborative environment where joint solutions are co-created.
   

  

 Join our team of forward thinking, tech-savvy professionals and embark on a journey of innovation, growth, and fulfillment. As a Customer Technology Advisor, you will not only shape the future of technology solutions but also make a meaningful impact on the success of our customers and Kyndryl as a whole.
   

  

 Your Future at Kyndryl
   

  

 Every position at Kyndryl offers a way forward to grow your career. We have opportunities that you won’t find anywhere else, including hands-on experience, learning opportunities, and the chance to certify in all four major platforms. Whether you want to broaden your knowledge base or narrow your scope and specialize in a specific sector, you can find your opportunity here.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important – you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer-focused – someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you’re open and borderless – naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**Required Skills And Experience**
* Deep domain knowledge of Services offerings and technical solutions in a practice
* Demonstrated experience translating distinctive technical knowledge into actionable customer insights and solutions
* Prior consultative selling experience
* Externally recognized as an expert in the technology and/or solutioning areas, including technical certifications supporting subdomain focus area(s) including: Application Data and AI; Cloud; Core Enterprise and zCloud; Digital Workplace; Network and Edge; Security and Resiliency


**Preferred Skills And Experience**
* Bachelor's degree or Master’s degree
* 5 years of experience (minimum) selling technical services for multi-industry customers


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: Projektledare
description:
**Ny Teknik Education växer – vi söker en projektledare!** 




  





**Vill du vara med och utveckla framtidens företagsutbildningar i gränslandet mellan teknik och affärer** 
 ? Då kan du vara vår nästa projektledare!
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Ny Teknik Education är ett modernt och snabbt växande utbildningsföretag som varje år arrangerar omkring
 **200 aktiviteter** 
 – allt från konferenser och fysiska utbildningar till digitala distanskurser och On Demand-utbildningar. Vi samarbetar med Sveriges främsta experter och skapar mötesplatser för ingenjörer, beslutsfattare och specialister i teknikintensiva branscher.
 



  





 Vi ingår i
 **Ny Teknik Group** 
 , där även Ny Teknik – Sveriges största medievarumärke för ingenjörer, tech/IT och beslutsfattare – ingår, och tillsammans är vi runt
 **35 medarbetare** 
 .
 



  





**Rollen** 





 Rollen innebär att projektleda utbildningar, kurser och konferenser – från idégenerering till konceptpaketering och genomförande. Som projektledare har du en mycket utåtriktad roll med dagliga kontakter med bland andra kursledare, kursdeltagare, föreläsare, affärspartners och medarbetare.
 




  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som:
 


* Är nyexaminerad eller har något/några års erfarenhet
* Du har sannolikt en utbildningsbakgrund inom projektledning, event management, digital marknadsföring, kommunikation eller motsvarande.
* Är nyfiken, strukturerad och gillar att ta initiativ
* Erfarenhet av B2B, konceptpaketering eller utbildningsadministration är meriterande.



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* En fast heltidstjänst i centrala Stockholm/hybrid
* En arbetsplats i stark tillväxt där du får växa med oss
* Möjligheten att arbeta nära både teknik och affärsutveckling
* En kreativ miljö där idéer snabbt kan bli verklighet



  





 Låter detta som en tjänst för dig? Välkommen att söka redan idag! Skicka ditt CV och ett personligt brev till info@nyteknikeducation.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Junior Analysts to M&A Transaction Services (Stockholm & Malmö) - Aug 2026
description:
Deloitte is a global leader in Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal and Consultative Services. With more than 450,000 employees in over 150 countries, we help our clients and our communities solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals through domain and industry expertise, global reach and alliances with the largest tech providers. What defines Deloitte is our drive to make a meaningful difference. For us, this means long-term development and results for our clients and their companies, ideas and actions that also contribute to positive societal development. It is also about empowering our people and promoting their development.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

 In M&A Transaction Services we support our clients in connection to acquisition or sale of companies by providing insightful financial analysis. Our work involves reviewing historical trading and balance sheets, assessing forecast consistency, and evaluating operational and financial assets and liabilities to help clients make well-informed decisions. Our clients include both domestic and international private equity firms and strategic corporates.
   

  

  





 As an Analyst in our M&A Transaction Services team, you will contribute by analysing financial data, preparing agendas for management interviews, and drafting due diligence reports. We highly value teamwork and collaboration, and you will work closely with experienced colleagues who will support your growth and development. Throughout your work, you are expected to demonstrate professionalism, integrity and a strong work ethic. This role offers a unique opportunity to build expertise in managing due diligence processes for both buyers and sellers of companies.
   

  

  





 We welcome applications from candidates with a master’s degree who are eager to join our team in Stockholm or Malmö in August 2026.
   

  

  




**Qualifications**

 We are looking for individuals who:
   

  

  




* Have a graduate degree (MBA/Master’s or equivalent) with strong academic results


* Are interested in financial analysis and motivated to understand business dynamics


* Enjoy working collaboratively and are motivated to learn and grow in a supportive environment


* Communicate effectively in English and preferably a Scandinavian language


* Are proficient in MS Excel and PowerPoint


* Approach challenges with a positive and flexible mindset, managing deadlines constructively


**Additional Information**

**What we offer**




 As a part of Deloitte you get access to the world’s largest consultancy network, meaning you have colleagues all over the globe who you can utilize in order to develop yourself, our clients and our business. You will work with exciting and complex projects both on a global and Nordic level within a team who values your perspective. Your personal development and the opportunities that help you grow is of great importance to us. We offer you practical experience, a personal coach as well as continuous feedback and input from more experienced colleagues.
   

  

  





 You get the opportunity to be part of an organization where we help our clients on their journey to become a more sustainable organization. You also get to be involved in our own initiatives regarding climate and environmental work as well as social responsibility.
   

  

  





**How to apply**




 Submit your application online as soon as possible. Your application should contain your:
   

  

  




* CV


* University grades. The grade document you upload should have been retrieved no more than 2 months ago


 In the first step, you upload your CV. In the next step, you upload your university transcripts (for courses completed so far) and answer questions related to the role, including a motivation for why you have applied for this role. Please note that you need to submit all the requested documents for your application to be considered completed. Apply as soon as possible as we review applications on an ongoing basis. Upon submitting your application, you should receive a confirmation email from us. If you don't receive this email, we advise you to submit your application again. If you are applying for multiple positions with us, please clarify in your applications which role you are most interested in.
   

  

  


**Questions**




 If you have any questions regarding the application process, please contact Sophie Karlerö Kolijn, Recruiter, at skarlero@deloitte.se.
   

  

  





 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, in order to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The process for background checks is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/. For the roles where university grades are requested a verification of the grades is made as a part of the recruitment process. If you have any questions, please contact the responsible recruiter.
   

  

  





**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Business analyst
description:
Vi söker en erfaren och driven konsult för att stärka upp inom vår kunds projektkontor. I denna roll kommer du som konsult att spela en viktig roll i att förstå och dokumentera affärsbehov samt säkerställa att lösningar uppfyller dessa krav. Du kommer ingå i flertalet projekt samtidigt där du kommer ansvara för kravhanteringen.
   

  

 Uppdragsbeskrivning:
   

  

* Stötta projektledare genom att ansvara och ta fram planer för kravarbetet
* Samla in, analysera och dokumentera affärskrav från intressenter.
* Utveckla detaljerade kravspecifikationer och funktionella specifikationer.
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteamet och arkitekter för att säkerställa att lösningar uppfyller affärsbehoven.
* Genomföra och driva workshops/möten med intressenter för att klargöra och prioritera krav.
* Delta i testning och validering av lösningar för att säkerställa att de uppfyller de definierade kraven.
* Eventuellt kommer möjligheten att driva vårt arbete kring att förbättra/förtydliga vår kravprocess att finnas också.


 Kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Några års erfarenhet av likande roll.
* Erfarenhet av att kravställa helt nya applikationer samt kravställa för att integrera SaaS-lösningar
* Stark förståelse för affärsprocesser och förmåga att översätta dessa till krav som går att utveckla på.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med PPS, agila metoder och verktyg som ex Azure DevOps
* Utmärkta kommunikations- och samarbetsförmågor.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta initiativ.
* Erfarenhet inom revisionsbranschen är meriterande


 Vi ser gärna att konsulten är på kundens kontor centralt i Stockholm så mycket som möjligt. Vi har onsdagar som obligatoriska dagar på kontoret.
   

  

**Omfattning: 100%**
**Språk: Svenska**
**Vänligen ansök snarast med:**
* Ditt uppdaterade CV
* Timpris (inkl. omkostnader)
* Tillgänglighetsdatum
* En kort motivering varför du är lämplig uppdraget.

title: Systemspecialist
description:
**Kungliga Tekniska högskolan, Verksamhetsstödet vid KTH** 




  





 Verksamhetsstödets uppgift är att stödja universitetets utbildning och forskning. KTH:s verksamhetsstöd är inne i en spännande fas där vi tillsammans arbetar med utveckling av våra arbetsformer. Som medarbetare inom verksamhetsstödet bidrar du till KTH:s uppdrag att forska, utbilda och skapa samhällsnytta och får samtidigt möjlighet till egen professionell utveckling.
 



  





**Om SciLifeLab Data Centre** 




  





 SciLifeLab är en av Sveriges största forskningssatsningar, med cirka 2500 forskare fördelade på ungefär 300 forskargrupper. SciLifeLab har verksamhet vid alla Sveriges stora universitet med syftet att göra Sverige till en världsledande nation inom life science.
 



  





 Data Centre mission är att facilitera forskning av världsklass och förbättra forskningskvaliteten genom att erbjuda betydelsefulla IT-tjänster. Data Centre bidrar till open science och återanvändning av forskningsresultat, deltar på högsta internationella nivå i teknikutveckling och formandet av best practices och standarder för data-driven life science research.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




  





 Ditt uppdrag är att i rollen som systemspecialist driva den tekniska koordineringen av SciLifeLabs IT-infrastruktur. Det innebär att planera och genomföra investeringar samt att arbeta med den långsiktiga förvaltningen av IT-infrastrukturer. Du är placerad i SciLifeLab Data Centre, rapporterar till Head of IT systems and Infrastructure och arbetar i nära samarbete med KTH ITs övriga verksamhet. Teknisk kompetens är viktigt men framförallt krävs en förmåga att arbeta tillsammans med andra skickliga systemspecialister från många olika organisationer. I rollen ingår också att stödja forskargrupper och plattformsenheter inom SciLifeLab med teknisk expertis samt fungera som brygga mellan dessa och IT funktionerna.
 



  





**Vi erbjuder** 




  




* En anställning på ett ledande tekniskt universitet som skapar kunskap och kompetens för en hållbar framtid
* Engagerade och ambitiösa kollegor samt en kreativ, internationell och dynamisk miljö



  






 Läs mer om hur det är att arbeta på KTH
 
 samt våra
 
 förmåner
 
 .
 



  





  





**Kvalifikationer** 




  





**Krav** 




  




* Universitets eller högskoleutbildning på motsvarande masternivå inom datavetenskap eller likvärde utbildning så som civilingenjör.
* Minst 10 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete inom IT, som utvecklare, systemspecialist, arkitekt eller liknande.
* Goda kunskaper inom container-teknologi så som Kubernetes och Docker.
* Goda kunskaper i utveckling med kunskaper inom flertal språk.
* Goda kunskaper i engelska, då det krävs i det dagliga arbetet



  





**Personliga egenskaper** 




  





 Vi söker dig som har en professionell inställning med hög servicenivå i såväl interna som externa kontakter. Du har förmågan att utföra dina arbetsuppgifter på ett självständigt sätt och stimuleras av nära samarbeten med kollegor och chefer inom KTH. Vi lägger därför vikt vid att du har mycket god samarbetsförmåga. Arbetet kräver att du är noggrann, kvalitetsmedveten och har en god problemlösande analysförmåga.
 



  





**Meriterande** 




  




* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Linux och open source.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av nätverk och IT-infrastruktur.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arkitektur och design arbete.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med IT-säkerhet.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med forskarinfrastruktur.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med Storage & Compute och molntjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med myndigheter/universitet, specifikt med Life Science inriktning.



  





 Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Fackliga representanter** 




  





 Kontaktuppgifter till
 

 fackliga representanter
 
 .
 



  





**Ansökan** 




  





 Du ansöker via KTH:s rekryteringssystem. Du som sökande har huvudansvaret för att din ansökan är komplett när den skickas in. Ansökan ska vara KTH tillhanda senast sista ansökningsdagen vid midnatt, CET/CEST (CentralEuropean Time/Central European Summer Time).
 



  





**Om anställningen** 




  





 Anställningen gäller tillsvidare enligt avtal.
 



  





 Anställningen inleds med sex månaders provanställning.
 



  





**Övrigt** 




  





 Strävan efter jämställdhet, mångfald och lika villkor är både en kvalitetsfråga och en självklar del av KTH:s värdegrund
 



  





 För
 
 information om behandling av personuppgifter
 
 i samband med rekrytering.
 



  





 Det kan förekomma att en anställning hos KTH är placerad i säkerhetsklass. Om så är fallet för just denna anställning görs en säkerhetsprövning av sökande i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) efter samtycke. I dessa fall är en förutsättning för anställning att sökande blir godkänd efter säkerhetsprövning.
 



 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av platsannonser.
 



  





**Om KTH** 




  





 KTH är ett av Europas ledande tekniska universitet och en viktig arena för kunskapsutveckling. Som Sveriges största universitet för teknisk forskning och utbildning samlar vi studenter, forskare och fakultet från hela världen. Vår forskning och utbildning omfattar såväl naturvetenskap som alla grenar inom teknik samt arkitektur, industriell ekonomi, samhällsplanering, historia och filosofi. Läs mer här

title: Nordea Investment Banking - Capital Markets internship spring 2026
description:
**Job ID: 30679**
 We are looking for ambitious and talented individuals to join our Debt Solutions and Capital Markets teams for a 20 weeks full-time internship in Stockholm, an unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in one of the leading financial institutions in the Nordic region
 **.**
**About Our Team**
 Meet the Debt Solutions and Capital Markets teams . Our role is to arrange, structure, underwrite and execute a variety of financing transactions for Corporate clients. We offer our clients a broad range of financing solutions including syndicated, club and bilateral loans, investment grade and high yield bonds, as well as capital structure advisory.
   

  

 Our Debt Solutions and Capital Markets teams are part of Nordea Investment Banking, comprising around 100 professionals located across our offices in Stockholm, Copenhagen, Helsinki, and Oslo. We work closely with other divisions within Nordea, ensuring seamless and comprehensive services to our clients.
   

  

 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in how we work and how we make decisions – and that we imagine you share with us.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
**Main responsibilities in this role:**
* Explore Financial Markets: Gain hands-on experience in credit analysis, financial modeling, and debt capital markets
* Collaborate on Real Projects: Work with experienced colleagues on live deals, from creating sales pitch materials to structuring complex debt financings
* Build a Strong Foundation: Develop a competitive skill set that will serve you throughout your career, whether you continue in investment banking or explore other financial paths


**Who You Are**
 This is the right role for you if you are proactive, self-driven, and eager to learn. You thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and are passionate about Capital Markets. You are ready to take ownership of tasks while working as part of a team to deliver outstanding results.
   

  

**Your background and skills include:**
* Bachelors degree in Finance, Economics, Business or a similar field is a prerequisite. It would be ideal if you are enrolled in a Master’s degree
* Curiosity & Passion: You have a genuine interest in finance and are excited to contribute your unique perspective
* Strong Academic Background: You’re committed to excellence in your studies and ready to apply your knowledge in a real-world setting
* Analytical & Strategic Thinking: You enjoy diving into data and solving complex problems
* Team Player: You thrive in collaborative environments and are eager to learn from others


 You also need to be fluent in Swedish and English.
   

  

 The role is based in Stockholm, and you will be part of our pan-Nordic team of highly skilled professionals who always walk the extra mile to provide our clients with best possible advice and service.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 People come here when they want to get somewhere. For some, it’s to take their career to the next level. For others, it’s to break new ground within their area of expertise – in other words, with us, you will always move forward.
   

  

**A culture** 
**that fosters performance and growth** 
 in one of the largest Nordic banks, offering various opportunities to evolve, develop and learn from brilliant colleagues with diverse backgrounds in a vibrant working environment.
   

  

**Diversity and inclusion** 
 are a natural part of our daily work. We know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable one. We genuinely believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us stronger together. Every day we strive to find new ways to improve diversity and inclusion within our community e.g. we have signed the European Diversity Charters in the countries where we operate to show our commitment and engage with others to continue learning and improving.
   

  

 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
   

  

**Next steps**
 Submit your application no later than 30/09/2025.
   

  

 For more information, you’re welcome to contact Catharina Boström at catharina.bostrom@nordea.com.
   

  

**We enable dreams and aspirations for a greater good.**
**We build relationships.** 
 We add a personal touch to everything we do – when advising our customers, collaborating with colleagues, and meeting our potential candidates.
   

  

**We learn and develop.** 
 We take pride in being experts and thinking ahead. We use our expertise to meet our customers’ needs, from the simplest to the most complex. We bring a growth mindset to our work that enables us to focus on a broader perspective in our daily challenges.
   

  

**We lead change.** 
 We are responsible and aware of the impact of our decisions, both for our customers and for our local and global communities. Mindful of our responsibility towards current and future generations, we have made sustainability an integrated part of our business strategy.
   

  

**We are Nordea.** 
 We have a 200-year history of supporting and growing the Nordic economies and our values are deeply rooted in these open, progressive and collaborative societies. As one of the biggest employers in the Nordics, Poland and Estonia, you have excellent opportunities to evolve, develop and move forward with us.
   

  

 For union related information, contact Finansförbundet on finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACO on saconordea@nordea.com.

title: Executive Assistant to the Allianz Commercial Managing Director for the Nordic region
description:
We are looking for an Executive Assistant to the Allianz Commercial Managing Director for the Nordic region, based in Stockholm.
   

  

  

  

**Your Team**
 Our Nordic team is a service minded and well-experienced team. Our local presence is growing and now consists of over 50 dedicated employees, located in Copenhagen, Helsinki and Stockholm, supporting Nordic clients with comprehensive and multinational risk transfer and insurance solutions.
   

  

**The Impact You Will Have**
 Reporting directly to the Allianz Commercial Managing Director for the Nordic region, based in Stockholm, you will provide high-level strategic and administrative support, and contribute to the success of strategy development and execution. You will coordinate key meetings, prepare impactful presentations, and ensure effective communication across departments and regions. Acting as a central interface, you will facilitate collaboration with senior stakeholders, support strategic initiatives, and help organize internal events. We operate at the heart of regional decision-making and execution.
   

  

 In addition, the EA is a key enabler for continued business impact by providing an important contribution to current projects and initiatives and serving as a communication interface between various stakeholders across Allianz Commercial regions and functions.
   

  

  

  

**Some Of Your Specific Responsibilities Could Include**
* Preparing Senior Management meeting contributions, including pre-screening, challenging, and action item follow-up
* Preparing and coordinating the teams’ contribution to planning and steering cycle (eg. Strategic & Planning Dialogues, Region Reviews)
* Preparing and following up meetings and events where the Allianz Commercial Managing Director for the Nordic region is involved (eg. external events, workers’ council meetings, town halls)
* Organizing, preparing and participating in internal meetings and events such as offsites, team meetings, etc.
* Managing and handling daily administrative tasks for the Allianz Commercial Managing Director for the Nordic region (eg. audit follow-up, cost center oversight, mid-/year-end review preparation, prepare decision templates and analyses)
* Steering and coordinating strategic projects, initiatives and workstreams
* Develop presentations, speeches or pitches for market events
* Drive coordination of the Allianz Commercial Nordic community, ensuring inclusion and support for a cohesive strategy
* Help shape and drive primary initiatives that drive improvements to Customer satisfaction, metric driven procedures, and achievement of productivity metrics


  

  

**What You’ll Bring To The Role**
* Strong ability to work independently and to execute
* Excellent analytical skills to interpret and synthesize complex information and to develop actionable solutions
* Experience in Business Analytics, Underwriting, Consulting, Transformation or Project Management with great knowledge of key financial and business KPIs
* Excellent communication skills to expressing ideas and messages to a variety of stakeholders within an international context
* In-depth knowledge of MS PowerPoint, Excel and the ability to create compelling and concise presentations will also be essential
* Attention to details and the ability to manage multiple work streams in a highly matrixed environment
* A diplomatic communicator, with the ability to prioritize effectively and coordinate input from various sources
* Fluent communication skills in English. One or more Nordic languages are meriting.
* Experience from global insurance carriers are meriting.
* Experience in applying artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to improve business processes and decision-making is highly beneficial


 80747 | Strategy | Professional | Allianz Commercial | Full-Time | Permanent
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
**Let’s Care About Everything That Makes You, You**
 We are committed to nurturing an inclusive environment where everyone feels they belong. We offer a hybrid working model, which recognizes the value of striking a balance between in-person collaboration and remote working. Please feel free to discuss flexible working arrangements with us.
   

  

**Let’s care for your financial wellbeing**
 We believe in rewarding performance with a great compensation and benefits package (details vary by location), including a generous bonus scheme and pension.
   

  

**Let’s care for your opportunities to progress**
 From career development and digital learning programs to international career mobility, we offer lifelong learning for our employees worldwide and an environment where innovation, delivery and empowerment are fostered.
   

  

**Let’s care for life’s twists and turns**
 From our support for flexible working, health and wellbeing (including private healthcare and generous parental leave benefits), to helping people return from career breaks with experience that nothing else can teach. We've got your back.
   

  

**Let’s care for our society and our planet**
 With opportunities to be engaged in shaping a future that is safe, inclusive and sustainable, we care for the tomorrows of our people, our industry and our clients.
   

  

**Care to join us?**
 Allianz Commercial is the center of expertise of Allianz Group, insuring mid-sized businesses, large enterprises, and special risks. Our customers include top consumer brands, financial institutions, industry leaders, the global aviation and shipping industries, as well as family-owned and medium-enterprises. We also cover unique risks such as offshore wind farms, infrastructure projects and film productions. Our clients trust us to provide a wide range of traditional and alternative risk transfer solutions, outstanding risk consulting and multinational services, and seamless claims handling. Allianz Commercial helps customers to prepare for what's ahead.
   

  

 Learn more about careers at Allianz Commercial by clicking here.
   

  

 Learn more about Allianz Commercial by clicking here.
   

  

 At Allianz, we stand for unity: we believe that a united world is a more prosperous world, and we are dedicated to consistently advocating for equal opportunities for all. And the foundation for this is our inclusive workplace, where people and performance both matters, and nurtures a culture grounded in integrity, fairness, inclusion and trust.
   

  

 We therefore welcome applications regardless of ethnicity or cultural background, age, gender, nationality, religion, social class, disability or sexual orientation, or any other characteristics protected under applicable local laws and regulations.
   

  

**Join us. Let's care for tomorrow**
**People With Disabilities**
 We want to give all our candidates the best opportunity to succeed. If you need any adjustments to be made during the application and selection process, please email agcsglobalcareers@allianz.com
   

  

**Recruitment Agencies**
 Allianz Commercial has an in-house recruitment team, which focuses on sourcing great candidates directly. Allianz Commercial does not accept unsolicited resumes from agency or search firm recruiters. Fees will not be paid in the event a candidate submitted by a recruiter without an agreement in place is hired. When we do use agencies, we have a PSL in place, so please do not contact managers directly. Failure to comply could/may result in the disqualification of the candidates and/or the termination of our contract and/or fees not being paid

title: Creative Technologist, Kyndryl Vital, Nordics & Baltics
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 The Role
   

  

 A Creative Technologist is a cross-disciplinary person that bridge between a design vision and engineering execution, using experimentation to solve problems in new and novel ways. They Combines technical expertise with human-centered design to prototype and implement innovative solutions. Creative technologists blend expertise in code, hardware, and emerging technologies to bring ideas to life.
   

  

 As a Creative Technologist at Kyndryl Vital Nordics and Baltics, you will:
   

  

* Collaborate with designers, engineers, and stakeholders to shape technical concepts aligned to human-centered design.
* Rapidly prototype interactive, testable experiences to drive alignment, learning, and value.
* Apply emerging technologies to business challenges, including AI/ML/GenAI, IoT, and immersive interfaces.
* Lead feasibility analysis and ethical review of technology choices.


 Required Technical and Professional Expertise
   

  

* Human-Centered Design: You have a deep understanding of human-centered design methods and mindset.
* Cross-disciplinary Collaboration: You excel at uniting design and engineering.
* Innovation: You can apply new applications for emerging tech.
* Rapid Prototyping: You can create context-appropriate, low- to high-fidelity digital and physical prototypes.
* Feasibility Analysis: You can assess design’s technical feasibility, system integration, and implementation pathways.
* Storytelling: You can translate prototypes and technical insights into compelling narratives.
* AI and Data Ethics: You leverage AI tools and data strategies with awareness of equity, bias, and transparency.


**Who You Are**
 Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise
   

  

* 3 plus years of relevant experience (dependent on level)
* Vertical domain experience (e.g., finance, retail, healthcare, industrial)
* Experience in both enterprise and agency worlds
* Knowledge and experience in IT infrastructure, architecture, and platform capabilities
* Background in behavioral science, change management, or design research
* Applied or academic experience with data science, AI/ML, or HCI


 You may specialize more deeply in:
   

  

* AI/ML/GenAI
* Phygital / Immersive Design
* IoT / Connected Product Design
* Mobile and Web Front-End Engineering


 Required Education
   

  

* Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field (or equivalent demonstrable portfolio of work).


**Preferred Education**
* Advanced degree or certification in design, HCI, computer science, or related (e.g., MDM, MDes, MFA, d.MBA or equivalent) is a plus.


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: GSS/K till operativ säkerhetsunderrättelsetjänst
description:
Som operatör vid 135. Säkerhetsskvadron arbetar du inom den militära säkerhetstjänsten med en tyngdpunkt på inhämtning av säkerhetsunderrättelser syftande till att indikera och identifiera misstänkta säkerhetshot mot Försvarsmaktens skyddsvärden.
   

  

 Du kommer i din anställning arbeta i en högst aktuell uppgift med en ständigt föränderlig hotbild. Arbetet är mycket långsiktigt och sker med hög diskretion. Som person bör du vara tålmodig, resultatinriktad och ha en hög förmåga till kreativt tänkande.
   

  

**Just nu söker 135. Säkerhetsskvadron:**
 Teknisk personal (GSS-K)
   

  

 Logistikassistent (GSS-K)
   

  

 Stabsassistent (GSS-K)
   

  

 Soldat (GSS-K)
   

  

 Till befattningen soldat rekryterar vi främst mot stf gruppchef, hundförare, farbsoldat, sjukvårdare, understödsskytt.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
 Det dagliga arbetet är omväxlande och innefattar allt från träning och utbildning till genomförandet av operativ verksamhet. En viktig del är också utveckling av verksamheten inom ditt framtida arbetsområde.
   

  

 Anställningen inleds med en ca 6 månader lång grundkurs, efter godkänt resultat placeras du mot lämplig befattning. Befattningsspecifika utbildningar påbörjas efter den gemensamma grundkursen.
   

  

**Önskvärda personliga egenskaper**
 Vi söker en trygg person med stort ansvarskännande och god initiativförmåga. Vidare bör du som person ha en hög tröskel för stress och vara van vid föränderliga miljöer då den operativa uppgiften är väldigt dynamisk.
   

  

 Som medarbetare hos oss förväntas du ta initiativ och kunna omsätta innebörden av egna beslut samt värdera dess konsekvenser i en större operativ kontext. Du bör kunna arbeta autonomt utan direkt styrning och fatta beslut utifrån tidigare givna ramar som ständigt strävar mot den övergripande målbilden.
   

  

 Vi ser att du är en person som förenar en grupp och bidrar till andras utveckling på ett prestigelöst sätt där individuella olikheter och kompetenser stärks och bygger en slagkraftig helhet.
   

  

 Då du i tjänsten kommer behandla säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter och arbetet i sin helhet omfattas av betydande sekretess, ser vi att du är en person med hög personlig mognad och stark integritet som inte drivs av ett yttre bekräftelsebehov.
   

  

 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet under rekryteringen.
   

  

**KRAV
   

  

 Kvalifikationer**
* Genomförd och godkänd militär grundutbildning.
* B-körkort.
* Svenskt medborgarskap.
* Ej pälsdjursallergiker.
* Genomförda och godkända resultat i enlighet med FMFysS.
* Godkänt resultat på urvalstester efter sammanvägd bedömning.


**MERITERANDE**
* Erfarenhet och utbildning inom dold inhämtning i terräng samt urban miljö.
* Arbete i säkerhetsförbandstjänst eller spaningstjänst i FM eller liknande företag/myndighet.
* Genomförd och godkänd militärpolisutbildning.
* Militära förarbevis samt vidare körutbildning civilt/militärt.
* Erfarenhet av nationell/internationell insats.
* Sjukvårdsutbildning CLS, jägarsjukvårdare, avancerad sjukvårdare (soldat).
* Fältarbetsutbildning främst min- och sprängtjänst samt forcering (soldat).
* Elektrikerutbildning (teknisk personal).
* Tidigare arbete med IT-/nätverk (teknisk personal).
* Försvarsmaktens tekniska system ex Rpas, TMM eller andra övervakningssystem (teknisk personal).
* Arbete med larmsystem eller andra former av kamera och övervakningssystem (teknisk personal).
* Erfarenhet och utbildning inom samband- och ledningssystem samt telekrig (sambandsofficer).
* Andra körkortsbehörigheter ex C, CE, truck, hjullastare (logistisk personal).
* Erfarenhet och arbete inom logistikförsörjning (logistisk personal).


**Övrigt** 
 Anställningsform: Tidsbegränsad GSS-avtal. Försvarsmakten tillämpar sex månaders provanställning för dig som inte är anställd i myndigheten.
   

  

 Placeringsort: Kungsängen, Livgardet.
   

  

 Under rekryteringsprocessen kommer urvalstester enligt ovan krav att genomföras under fyra dagar. Testet kommer vara fysiskt och psykiskt krävande och du skall inte köra bil på söndagen efter testet.
   

  

 Testtillfälle: 20251106-09. Testerna genomförs i närheten av Livgardet.
   

  

 Anställningsstart: 1/9 2026
   

  

 Lön: Vi tillämpar individuell lönesättning.
   

  

 Vid frågor rörande rekryteringen vänligen vänd er till förbandet på mailadress: lg-13sakbat-135mpsakskv@mil.se
   

  

 Ansökan sker via ReachMee. Ansökan skall innehålla CV, personligt brev, referenser samt betyg och intyg som styrker den
