title: Technical Customer Success Manager (Cloud Infrastructure)
description:
**Technical Customer Success Manager (Cloud Infrastructure) – Remote (Europe)**
**Intro**
 At Humanitec, we’re on a mission to make life easier for developers by helping organizations build world-class Internal Developer Platforms (IDPs). Our Platform Orchestrator is already shaping how engineering teams deliver software, and we’re looking for someone who wants to be part of that journey.
   

  

 This isn’t your typical “support” role. As a
 *Technical Customer Success Manager* 
 , you’ll be solving real infrastructure problems, guiding engineering teams, and shaping how customers adopt our technology. If you like rolling up your sleeves, diving into Kubernetes clusters, and being the person customers trust when things get tricky, you’ll feel right at home here.
   

  

**About Humanitec**
 We’re pioneers in platform engineering, helping enterprise organizations unlock developer productivity at scale. Our team is distributed across the globe, fully remote, and united by a culture of transparency, autonomy, and collaboration.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Acting as the go-to person for technical questions from customers and prospects.
* Troubleshooting and resolving issues hands-on. You’re not just escalating, you’re solving.
* Spotting patterns in customer challenges and improving processes (better documentation, tools, workflows).
* Feeding customer insights and recurring needs back into the Product team to shape our roadmap.
* Partnering closely with Sales, Product, and Engineering to make sure customers get the most out of our Platform Orchestrator.
* Sharing your infrastructure know-how and advocating for best practices around Kubernetes, Terraform, and modern cloud-native tooling.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Great communication skills and genuine enjoyment in working with customers.
* A solid technical foundation in software or infrastructure (Terraform, Kubernetes, IaC). You don’t need to be a guru, but you should be confident jumping into technical detail.
* Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
* The ability to juggle multiple requests without losing track of the details.
* A proactive, self-driven mindset. You like owning problems and seeing them through.


**It Would Be a Plus If You Have**
* Experience in Platform Engineering, IDPs, or the broader cloud-native ecosystem.
* Previous customer-facing technical experience.


**Why You’ll Enjoy Working With Us**
* Work at the forefront of Platform Engineering with enterprise customers.
* Fully remote, with the flexibility to work from anywhere in Europe.
* A role where your work directly shapes how our customers succeed.
* A collaborative culture that values transparency and inclusion.
* The chance to work hands-on with cutting-edge tools and define best practices in the industry.

title: Product Manager AWS
description:
G+D makes the lives of billions of people around the world more secure. We shape trust in the digital age with built-in security tech in three segments: Digital Security, Financial Platforms and Currency Technology. We have been a reliable partner for our customers for over 170 years with our innovative solutions for SecurityTech! We are an international technology group and traditional family business with over 14,000 employees in 40 countries. Creating Confidence is our path to success. Trust is the basis of our collaboration within G+D.
   

  

 We are the reliable partner for all challenges resulting from the Internet of Things. We offer a complete connectivity portfolio for mobile network operators, automotive manufacturers, technology companies such as chip and module manufacturers as well as transport and logistics providers. Our portfolio includes highly secure solutions in the area of connectivity & IoT, from classic SIM, eSIM and iSIM, to the associated embedded operating systems and life cycle management, through to services for global connectivity and IoT solutions. Do you want to actively shape the digital transformation with us?
   

  

 Give yourself an outstanding opportunity to develop and form your career in a dynamic and international environment. We are now looking for an Product Manager with focus on cloud transformation in AWS to join us at G+D Mobile Security for a permanent position based in Stockholm.
   

  

 Join our team to lead cutting-edge B2B software solutions trusted by global leaders in telecom, automotive, and IoT. As Product Manager AWS, you’ll shape the future of digital services by driving cloud transformation and scalable product strategies on AWS. Your expertise in AWS migrations will be key to delivering innovative, cloud-native solutions that set industry standards.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 We are looking for a Product Manager with strong AWS expertise, cloud migration experience, and knowledge of IoT and eSIM technologies to drive transformational projects and optimize our cloud infrastructure. In this role you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Leading the product lifecycle from ideation to launch, ensuring seamless transitions.
* Innovate business models for new digital offerings and support it with business cases.
* Craft and execute product strategies that drive sustainable growth.
* Transform business vision into product reality by understanding market dynamics and customer needs.
* Design product concepts, manage backlogs, develop roadmaps, and coordinate agile plans with cross-functional teams.
* Prioritize and review requirements to ensure market acceptance and customer value.
* Drive successful product development and growth initiatives to meet market, technical, financial and schedule requirements.


**Qualifications**
 We are looking for a dynamic leader with exceptional communication skills and a strong commercial mindset. In this role, you will guide the team into the cloud environment, which includes inspiring and motivating others, delivering presentations, and staying attuned to market trends. A deep understanding of AWS is essential, as the role has a strong focus on cloud technologies. Moreover, you need to have:
   

  

* University or Master's degree in Engineering, Economics, or Computer Science.
* Experience in Product Management or related roles in Software Engineering or Solution Architecture within IT, Software, or Telecommunications.
* Proven experience in product management for B2B software solutions
* Expertise in AWS Marketplace and also other major cloud providers
* Proficiency in Business English


 It is extra good if you have:
   

  

* Cloud provider certifications in AWS
* Experience using AI in a business context


 Do you want to contribute to build the future for a seamless and connected society? Then apply today!
   

  

**What can we offer you?**
 In this role you will have the opportunity to work with talented people in an international and innovative environment. G+D is a well-established family-owned company at the forefront of the market. Besides a dynamic and evolving industry, we offer you:
   

  

* Annual wellness allowance of 4500 SEK
* Three additional days off per year
* Weekly sport activity hour
* Collective agreement
* Access to the Benify Portal for health activities and discounts
* Skandia health insurance
* Vacation exchange program
* Hybrid office model with the option to work 50% from home
* Weekly breakfast at the office


 Get to know us and our team at G+D Sweden better by listening to our Jobcast below:Shaping the next chapter of the digital ageSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/71GyhbDv090LgVyukyLf7v?si=f399b1f0d93e47e3
   

  

 Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e072f95211700118d82a4Our DNA is in our peopleSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6BpWiUCMXr3q68dSGEr2w7?si=e4328a3c8db34b8d
   

  

 Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e070580b8d100110f0e95

title: Manager - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 As a Manager at BCG Platinion in the Nordics, you are responsible for the execution and management of our national and international client projects. We collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on site and directly with the client company. The Manager role incorporates structuring the project and performing the required resource planning. Besides the functional navigation of the project members, you will also be involved operationally in the project business. Together with our clients, you will develop convincing IT strategies, concepts and solutions, applying technical know-how and extensive experience in structuring IT projects, just as analytical and conceptual skills. We independently support our clients, present our results to their decision makers, and agree on the next steps.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* bring a completed a degree in computer science, (business) informatics, or a related area with above-average grades
* have at least eight years of substantial experience in IT consulting and the lead design and management of IT strategy and implementation projects
* already captured project-related management experience as the lead of teams with more than five people
* know how to plan IT initiatives and build solid business cases
* optimally steer decisions towards the goal and master escalating situations with an eye to solutions - even in complex organizational structures
* have successfully acquired consulting projects
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Independently contribute to build close client relationships - and as their trusted advisor, you are the first to whom they turn
* Acquire new projects and challenges for our company and yourself
* Be in charge of planning, leading, and assuring quality for strategic IT projects - we work with passion for our clients' long-term success
* Get to use your comprehensive knowledge of technology and industry understanding to provide both internal and external stakeholders with the orientation they need in critical project phases and challenging situations
* Think across projects and connecting factors, and plan resources to achieve the best efficiency possible
* Take ownership for presenting key project results at the highest level of client management
* Work with an entrepreneurial approach and passion to advance BCG Platinion with your contributions to people development, recruiting, and practice areas


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Management Consultant - Digital Strategy and IT Operating Model
description:
**About The Role**
 As a Management Consultant in Technology Strategy & IT Operations at KPMG, you will play a pivotal role in guiding our clients through their digital transformation journeys. You will leverage your expertise in digital strategy, IT operating models, and technology transformation to help clients achieve their business objectives. This role requires a deep understanding of digital technologies, strategic thinking, and the ability to contribute and lead complex projects.
   

  

 This role is open to candidates with a range of experience levels, from early-career professionals with 2-4 years of experience, ready to take the next step, to seasoned consultants with 6-10 years of experience, looking for a new challenge. Your impact, adaptability and growth mindset matter as much as your years in the field.
   

  

 Responsibilities will be adapted based on your experience. Junior team members will focus on delivery and learning, while senior professionals shall take on engagement or project leadership, solutioning or architectural responsibilities and provide mentoring.
   

  

 The role can be placed in Stockholm or Gothenburg, depending on your location and preference.
   

  

**Our Fields of Engagement**
* Digital Strategy Development: Collaborate with clients to develop comprehensive digital strategies that align with their business goals and objectives. This includes assessing current digital capabilities, identifying opportunities for improvement or developing futuristic roadmaps for digital transformation
* IT Operating Model Design: Design and implement future ready IT operating models that enhance efficiency, scalability and agility. This involves defining organization model, governance and steering model for IT, Business-IT Alignment, IT processes, Service delivery efficiency, performance KPIs and roles that complement client's digital strategy
* IT Strategic Sourcing: Analyze and optimize IT sourcing strategy, supplier landscape and IT spend to ensure value for money. This involves conducting cost-benefit analysis, benchmarking, reviewing supplier performance and identifying opportunities for cost savings. Additionally, support client with complex and strategic sourcing initiatives (RFx process)
* CIO advisory: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients Tech/IT leadership acting as a trusted advisor. Understand CxO business and IT challenges and provide tailored and optimal solutions, insights
* Thought Leadership: Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies. Contribute to thought leadership by presenting at conferences, and participating in industry forums and developing articles, point of views and surveys


 ,
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in information technology, Business Administration, or a related field
* 2-10 years of experience in Digital/Technology strategy, IT Operating model, IT Service delivery and Steering Model transformation, cost transformation, or Technology transformation roles
* Experience from top-tier consulting firms or large enterprises is preferred
* Understanding of cloud strategy and cloud transformation, emerging technologies (AI, Gen & Agentic AI, Modern Data platforms) or IT infrastructure & IT operations
* Understanding of Enterprise Architecture concepts, Industry leading platforms across functions (e.g. ERP, CRM, CPQ, e-commerce, Supply chain & Logistics, Data Platforms)
* Contribute to developing client solution/proposals into the sales process
* Contribute to practice building initiatives and broader initiatives within advisory at KPMG
* Curious with attitude of continuous learning
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Proactive, entrepreneurial and collaborative mindset
* Excellent stakeholder management skills


**Why Join KPMG**
* Global Network: Be part of a global network of professionals and gain access to international projects and knowledge sharing
* Career Development: Benefit from continuous learning and development opportunities, including training courses, mentorship programs, and career progression pathways
* Inclusive Culture: Work in an inclusive and diverse environment where everyone's ideas and contributions are valued
* Impactful Work: Make a lasting, positive impact on clients and society through meaningful and challenging work


 At KPMG, we are committed to fostering a culture of integrity, excellence, and collaboration. We believe in empowering our people to make a positive impact on our clients, communities, and society. Our values guide our actions and help us achieve our vision of being the preferred insights-led professional services firm.
   

  

 If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for digital transformation and a commitment to excellence, we invite you to join our team at KPMG and help us shape the future of our clients' businesses.
   

  

**Make a difference with us?**
 We welcome and look forward to receiving your application also during the summer, the selection process will begin at the start of August.
   

  

 If you have any questions, please contact Marie-Louise Bååth, marie-louise.baath@kpmg.se

title: Data Engineer
company_industry: Staffing and Recruiting, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Banking
description:
Role - Data Engineer
 



 Location - Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid)
 



 Type - B2B Contract
 



  





**Job Description:** 




**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines to support business analytics and reporting needs.
* Implement data transformation rules and ensure data quality through rigorous testing and validation.
* Utilize SQL and Python scripting to automate data quality checks and testing processes.
* Work with ETL tools to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into cloud-based platforms.
* Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver reliable data solutions.
* Monitor and optimize data workflows for performance and reliability.
* Maintain documentation of data pipelines, transformation logic, and quality assurance procedures.
* Develop a functional understanding of the data to ensure accurate and meaningful data processing.



**Qualifications:** 



* Proficiency in SQL and Python scripting, particularly for data quality and testing.
* Experience with ETL tools and cloud-based data platforms such as Databricks and Snowflake.
* Strong knowledge of data pipeline creation and implementation of transformation rules.
* Ability to perform data quality checks and troubleshoot data issues.
* Understanding of data modeling and data warehousing concepts.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

title: Chief Sales Officer till Mysafety
description:
**Chief Sales Officer till Mysafety – där ingen står ensam** 




  





 Att leda försäljning kan ibland kännas som att stå ensam på toppen: ansvar för siffrorna, pressen på tillväxt och målen att leverera. Men utan rätt lag runt dig är vägen dit både krokig och tung.
 



 Hos Mysafety bygger vi något annat. Vi finns till när människor drabbas av det oväntade – bedrägerier, identitetsstölder och ekonomisk oro. När tryggheten rubbas och oron slår till, då kliver vi in. Vårt ”why” är därför självklart: Together. Never alone. Det gäller för våra kunder, men också för dig som blir en del av vårt team.
 



  





 Som
 **Chief Sales Officer** 
 hos oss leder du försäljningsstrategin och dess genomförande i hela organisationen. Du bygger långsiktiga partnerrelationer med stort förtroende och tydlig riktning framåt, inspirerar våra telemarketing- och kundserviceteam och utvecklar samarbetet med externa säljpartners. Med driv, engagemang och närvaro leder du ledare, stärker organisationen och visar vägen mot resultat där intäkts- och premieutveckling och en kultur av gemensam framgång går hand i hand.
 



  





**VI SÖKER DIG SOM:** 



* Har mångårig erfarenhet av ledande roller inom försäljning och vana att leda ledare
* Har dokumenterad erfarenhet av att bygga och utveckla stora säljorganisationer, inklusive outsourcad verksamhet
* Är strategisk och kommersiellt driven, med förmåga att omsätta marknadsinsikter till affärsresultat
* Är relationsskapande och bygger långsiktigt förtroende med partners, kunder och interna team
* Har stark analytisk och finansiell kompetens och fattar beslut baserade på data
* Är en inspirerande ledare med engagemang och drivkraft, som motiverar, skapar ansvarstagande och får människor att växa och lyckas tillsammans
* Behärskar svenska och engelska obehindrat i tal och skrift



  





**I GENGÄLD ERBJUDER VI:** 



* En central roll i ledningsgruppen, med ansvar för tillväxt och lönsamhet
* Möjligheten att leda och utveckla en bred säljorganisation med både interna team och externa partners
* Ett bolag med tydlig strategi och stark position, där du är en drivande kraft i att nå våra mål
* En kultur som präglas av prestation, engagemang och teamkänsla



  





 Plats: Stockholm
 



 Omfattning: Heltid, tillsvidare
 



  





 Är du redo att leda försäljningen och samtidigt bli en del av något större?
 



 Välkommen till Mysafety – Together. Never alone.

title: Modern Workplace Engineering Architect | M365
description:
Unlock the potential of Modern Workplace Engineering Architecture as a visionary architect, transforming challenges into cutting-edge solutions and leading the transformation and the empowerment of business to thrive in the digital era with Microsoft technologies.
   

  

**Come join us**
 Are you a visionary Microsoft 365 Architect? Join our Modern Workplace Practice and unleash your expertise in crafting innovative solutions that harness the full potential of Microsoft 365 suite. You will have a pivotal role in our team as Solution Architect where you will need to understand the business needs and requirements and turn it into innovative solutions based on Microsoft technologies. You will become the front figure in projects and mentor to your peers to drive transformative success with your unparalleled skillset.
 **Together we do what matters.**
**Skills And Experiences**
 You have previous and solid experience with:
   

  

* Demonstrating confidence in designing end-to-end solutions across Microsoft 365 suite.
* Showing good control and eager leadership in managing clients' conversations.
* Understanding business advantages in Microsoft security tools (i.e. Defender and Purview).
* Implementing Microsoft Identity and Endpoint Management techniques and best practices.
* Using with natural proficiency PowerShell.
* Applying strong business acumen in migrations tools (i.e. Quest), Code controls (i.e. Git repositories), ITSM tools, Azure and automation.
* Showing a critical thinking, problem-solving and troubleshooting approach.


**About You**
 You’re a natural leader who fosters collaboration and manages dynamic teams to drive project success. You will proactively identify business opportunities to enhance and expand the range of Microsoft 365 suite business solutions provided to clients. Your interpersonal and communication skills help technical and non-technical clients engage with often complex information.
   

  

**Characteristics That Can Spell Success For This Role Are**
* Stay ahead of the curve and explore groundbreaking solutions with a genuine thirst for success.
* Be an adviser to emerging technologists on career growth opportunities.
* Act as a trusted mentor, providing performance reviews and feedback when necessary.
* Be a relationship builder, engaging with clients to ensure their satisfaction.


**What You'll Do**
 As a Modern Workplace Engineering Architect, your focus is on Microsoft 365 suite solutions within the Workplace services field. You will apply your expertise in M365 solutioning by translating business requirements into innovative technical solutions. Acting as a front figure in projects, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams under challenging circumstances to deliver high-quality solutions, ensuring customer satisfaction and fostering client relationships. You will stay updated with the latest technological trends in the Modern Workplace domain and attend partner events, sharing best practices and mentoring professional coworkers in the Modern Workplace domain to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
   

  

**Learn more**
 To learn more about the types of projects our Modern Workplace team works on check out these case studies:
   

  

* Why now is the time to modernize your communications capabilities
* Workplace experience: Why evergreen is everything


 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

* Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation
* Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade


**Enjoy your career**
 Some of the best things about working at Avanade
   

  

* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year, with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


  

  

 Find out more about some of our benefits Employee Benefits at Avanade | Avanade
   

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you’ll get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page.
   

  

  

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on
   

  

* Expanding your thinking
* Experimenting courageously
* Learning and pivoting


  

  

 Inspire greatness in our people by
   

  

* Empowering every voice
* Encouraging boldness
* Celebrating progress


  

  

 Accelerate the impact of our people by
   

  

* Amazing the client
* Prioritizing what matters
* Acting as one

title: Data Engineer Lead
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage and Online and Mail Order Retail
description:
Do you want to be at the heart of a major data transformation journey, for one of the leading Nordic logistics and commerce companies?
 



  





 This organisation are at the forefront of re-shaping the future of the industry, working with cutting-edge technology such as AI and Machine Learning, on a mission to become a truly data-driven organisation connecting people, businesses and society through efficient, sustainable solutions.
 



  





 As part of this strategy, we are looking for a Data Engineering lead to play a pivotal role in shaping new data products that will drive innovation, efficiency and customer value across the Nordics.
 



  





**What you'll do:** 



* Build scalable, high-quality data products
* Translate complex business needs into smart, efficient data solutions
* Shape data pipelines, models & visualisations that empower decision-making
* Collaborate across business & IT to drive innovation
* Drive data governance, privacy and compliance standards
* Coach, mentor and guide colleagues



  





**What we're looking for:** 



* Strong background in data management, development, and delivery of data solutions.
* Proven experience in data pipeline design, optimization, and visualization.
* Hands-on expertise with cloud platforms (Azure preferred), Databricks, Python and SQL.
* Solid knowledge of data governance, compliance, and lifecycle management.
* Skilled communicator, able to bridge business and technical perspectives.
* Collaborative, forward-thinking, and comfortable leading in an evolving environment.
* Fluent in English



  





**Your Impact** 




 In your first year, you’ll help deliver three new data products into production, develop their data catalog, and establish a comprehensive data playbook. Long term, you’ll play a vital role in making them a data-centric organisation, enabling innovation, sustainability, and operational excellence.
 



  





 If this sounds like you and you're excited to lead the way in building impactful data solutions and transform how a leading Nordic company uses customer data, we'd love to hear from you!

title: Senior Manager - Data Management and Enterprise Architecture Expert within Management Consulting
description:
**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly performing and experienced Senior Data Management and Enterprise Architecture Professional to join our team within Management Consulting. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data management, data governance, and data analytics as well as working with Business and IT Architecture, with a proven track record of delivering successful projects. This will involve working closely with clients to understand and approach their data challenges. This includes developing and implementing data strategies and enterprise architecture design to ensure data quality, compliance and the effective utilization of data for strategy deployment.
   

  

 The role can be placed in Stockholm or Gothenburg, depending on your location and preference.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Lead and manage projects in the data management and enterprise architecture area, ensuring timely and successful delivery
* Develop and implement data governance frameworks and policies to ensure data quality, integrity, compliance and security
* Drive and lead initiatives within the enterprise architecture domain, addressing strategic questions related to application landscapes, system integration, data flows, platform selection, and alignment with business capabilities
* Collaborate with clients to understand their data requirements and provide tailored data solutions

* Actively drive the collaboration with sectors/accounts and KPMG global capabilities to identify opportunities and drive business development

* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in data management and analytics


 ,
   

  

**Qualifications**

* Minimum of 12 years of experience in data management and enterprise architecture or related fields
* Strong knowledge of data governance frameworks, data quality management, and data protection regulation
* Experience working with modern data platforms such as Databricks, Snowflake, Microsoft Azure Data Platform, or other relevant technologies
* Hands-on experience with data migration, integration, and building scalable data pipelines across modern cloud or on-premise environments
* Experience with AI and machine learning technologies
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and team members
* Proven ability to manage multiple projects and deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines


**Why Join KPMG**
**Global Network:** 
 Be part of a global network of professionals and gain access to international projects and knowledge sharing
   

  

**Career Development:** 
 Benefit from continuous learning and development opportunities, including training courses, mentorship programs, and career progression pathways
   

  

**Inclusive Culture:** 
 Work in an inclusive and diverse environment where everyone's ideas and contributions are valued

 At KPMG, we are committed to fostering a culture of integrity, excellence, and collaboration. We believe in empowering our people to make a positive impact on our clients, communities, and society. Our values guide our actions and help us achieve our vision of being the preferred insights-led professional services firm.
   

  

 If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for digital transformation and a commitment to excellence, we invite you to join our team at KPMG and help us shape the future of our clients' businesses.
   

  

**Make a difference with us?**

title: Windows Systemadministratör
description:
**Vi söker erfarna Windows Systemadministratörer**
 Har du gedigen erfarenhet av Windows-miljöer och brinner för att arbeta med drift, förvaltning och utveckling av IT-infrastruktur? Vi söker nu
 **Windows Systemadministratörer** 
 som vill fortsätta utvecklas inom området och bidra med sin expertis i komplexa IT-miljöer.
   

  

 Hos oss trivs du som motiveras av problemlösning, gillar att ta ansvar och har ett genuint intresse för att fördjupa dig i tekniken.
   

  

***Vi erbjuder dig:***
* Trygga anställningsvillkor och en fast månadslön
* Goda utvecklingsmöjligheter som konsult och en långsiktig plan hos Nexer


***Dina arbetsuppgifter:***
 Som
 **Windows Systemadministratör** 
 kommer du att arbeta ute hos någon av våra kunder med fokus på drift, administration och utveckling av deras IT-miljö.
   

  

***Rollen innebär bland annat att:***
* Ansvara för drift, underhåll och optimering av Windows Server-miljöer
* Administrera och utveckla Active Directory, inklusive GPO:er
* Arbeta med applikationspaketering, klienthantering och distribution (ex. via SCCM/Intune)
* Automatisera och effektivisera processer med hjälp av PowerShell
* Förvalta och supportera Microsoft 365-miljöer
* Delta i projekt såsom molnmigreringar, uppgraderingar och säkerhetsförbättringar


***Vi söker dig som:***
* Har flera års erfarenhet av systemadministration inom Windows-miljöer
* Har erfarenhet av: Windows Server, Active Directory, GPO:er, SCCM/Intune, PowerShell, VMware, M365 och Windows OS
* Har god förståelse för IT-drift, förvaltning och felsökning på en avancerad nivå
* Behärskar svenska obehindrat i både tal och skrift


***Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:***
* ITIL-processer
* Nätverk och säkerhet
* Cloud-tjänster (Azure, M365)


***Om dig***
 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är analytisk, initiativtagande och ihärdig när det gäller felsökning och problemlösning. Du har god samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
   

  

***Mer om Nexer Infrastructure***
 Nexer Infrastructure (tidigare Sigma IT Tech) startade sin verksamhet 2018 och är specialister på en sak – talanger inom drift, support och infrastruktur. Vi hjälper företag att växa och framtidssäkra sin kompetens med flexibla konsulttjänster. Våra kunder är välkända aktörer och marknadsledande inom sina respektive branscher.
   

  

 Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att du ska trivas, bland annat genom gemensamma aktiviteter som föreläsningar, after works och lunchträffar. Hos oss lyssnar vi alltid på dina behov och vilken riktning du vill utvecklas i.
   

  

***Ansökan***
 Urval sker löpande – skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att läsa den. Har du frågor är du varmt välkommen att kontakta: pauline.ryott@nexergroup.com

title: IT SÄKERHETSCHEF
description:
Hos oss blir du en viktig pusselbit i Försvarsmaktens vision; för ett starkare försvar – möter varje hot, klarar varje utmaning. Det är vi som tillsammans får det att hända. Allvar och ansvar i ett positivt samarbetsklimat där vi alla är kunniga, öppna och engagerade.
   

  

 Hälsa och personlig utveckling är viktig för såväl oss anställda som vår arbetsgivare.
   

  

**Om avdelningen**
 Försvarsstaben stödjer överbefälhavaren med att handlägga och bereda ärenden på militärstrategisk nivå, samt säkerställer att beslut som fattas av myndighetens ledning genomförs, följs upp och återredovisas. Försvarsstaben ansvarar även för att omsätta regeringens styrning av Försvarsmakten till strategiska planer och för att inrikta försvarsgrens- och stridskraftschefer. Vidare har försvarsstaben ett övergripande ansvar för att samordna infrastruktur- och materialförsörjning.
   

  

 Säkerhetsavdelningen är placerad under chefen Försvarsstaben och ansvarar för säkerhetstjänsten inom chefen Försvarsstabens verksamhetsansvar. Avdelningen består av Säkerhetssektionen, suasektionen och Värnpliktssäkerhetssektionen.
   

  

 Denna befattning är placerad vid säkerhetssektionen, och som inriktning informationssäkerhet är din uppgift att på strategisk nivå arbeta med informationssäkerheten inom Försvarsstaben samt ge stöd till andra delar av Försvarsmakten. Du bidrar även med stöd gällande informationsklassificering, tillsyn och utredningar efter förlust av information.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Verka som en ambassadör för informationssäkerhet.
* Stödja, koordinera försvarsstabens arbete inom informationssäkerhet
* Ta fram och vidareutveckla riktlinjer och verktyg
* Fungera som intern expert och rådgivare i frågor som rör informationssäkerhet
* Medverka i arbetet kring att vidareutveckla och implementera modeller för informationsklassificering
* Stärka intern medvetenhet och kompetens genom utbildning och praktiskt stöd
* Främja en kultur där informationssäkerhet är en självklar del av vardagen
* Bidra till ökad säkerhetsmognad och beredskap för framtida säkerhetsutmaningar


 Försvarsmakten är under stark tillväxt och arbetsuppgifterna kan komma utvecklas över tid.
   

  

**KRAV
   

  

 Kvalifikationer**
* Relevant utbildning inom säkerhetsskyddsområdet (ex säkerhetssamordnare eller diplomerad säkerhetsskyddschef) alternativt utbildning eller kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdiga
* Relevant erfarenhet av arbete med informationssäkerhet
* God förmåga att kommunicera och uttrycka dig väl på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Personliga egenskaper**
 För att du både ska trivas och passa i denna befattning behöver du vara resultatinriktad, relationsskapande och strukturerad.
   

  

 Du har en hög integritet, en hög säkerhetsmedvetenhet och en god förmåga att tänka nytt och vara kreativ för att lösa dina uppgifter. Som person är du prestigelös som tycker det är viktigt att hålla deadlines. Du är en person som trivs med att utbilda, engagera, vägleda och utveckla organisationens behov.
   

  

 En stor del av arbetet sker i mycket nära samarbete med andra vilket ställer höga krav på din förmåga att bygga och behålla goda relationer.
   

  

 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**MERITERANDE**
* Säkerhetsskyddsutbildningar i Försvarsmaktens regi
* Kunskap om Försvarsmaktens ledningssystem
* Erfarenhet av arbete med signalskydd
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram och hålla utbildningar inom säkerhetsskyddsområdet
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsskyddsarbete i samband med NATO


*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på www.forsvarsmakten.se).*
**Övrigt** 
 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning. Försvarsmakten tillämpar sex månaders provanställning för dig som inte är anställd i myndigheten.
   

  

 Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort: Lidingövägen, Stockholm
   

  

 Civil eller militär befattning: Detta är en civil befattning
   

  

 Tillträdesdatum: Snarast enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 I tjänsten kan resor förekomma.
   

  

**Upplysningar om befattningen** 
 Du är välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Anders Lindstedt vid frågor tel. 08-788 75 00 (växel)
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare** 
 SACO HKV Stefan Ungerth
   

  

 OFR/O HKV Arne Nilsson
   

  

 SEKO HKV Monika Danielsson
   

  

 OFR/S HKV Kjell Tetzlaff
   

  

 Samtliga nås via växeln på tel.: 08-788 75 00
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag**
 Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025-09-14. Din ansökan bör innehålla CV samt ansökningsbrev där du motiverar varför du är lämpad för denna befattning.
   

  

**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 ----------------------------------------------------- Information om det rekryterande förbandet: I Högkvarteret finns överbefälhavaren och generaldirektören. Högkvarteret har ungefär 1 000 medarbetare – både yrkesofficerare och civila experter. Högkvarteret utgörs från 2023-01-01 av försvarsstaben, operationsledningen, militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten, samt Högkvarterets stabsavdelning och fristående enheter för tillsyn. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Dataarkitekt till Knowit Stockholm
description:
**Din roll**
 Som dataarkitekt hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* Ta ansvar för design och arkitektur i data- och analyslösningar
* Arbeta med moderna tekniker inom moln och dataplattformar
* Delta i kunddialoger för att översätta behov till tekniska lösningar
* Stötta utvecklingsteam i genomförande och val av metodik


**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Erfarenhet av systemarkitektur och design av dataplattformar
* God kunskap inom en eller flera molnmiljöer (t.ex. Azure, AWS eller GCP)
* Vana att arbeta med integrationer, databaser och analyslösningar
* Förmåga att se helheter och förstå hur tekniska val påverkar långsiktigt


**Varför Knowit?**
 Hos oss får du arbeta i projekt med tydlig teknisk tyngd, tillsammans med kollegor som gärna delar erfarenheter och lösningar. Vi värdesätter en öppen kultur, kunskapsutbyte och möjligheten att utvecklas inom både arkitektur och nya tekniker.
   

  

 Är du lösningsarkitekt med fokus på teknik och systemutveckling? Skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av Knowit Datalytics.

title: Kreativ Content Manager till KGK | Autoexperten
description:
*KG Knutsson AB Vår vision är att föra människor framåt. Med våra produkter och tjänster tar vi människan framåt på vägen, genom livet, i rusningstrafiken, på semestern eller på jobbet. Vill man göra det lätt för sig säger man att vi med vår e-handelsplats autokatalogen.se säljer reservdelar och tillbehör till bilar, lastbilar, bussar, båtar och arbetsfordon. Det är onekligen en stor del av vår omsättning. Men vi är så mycket mer, vi deltar i omställningen till en fossilfri fordonsflotta med vårt dotterbolag Carsmart, vi strävar mot att skapa en cirkulär ekonomi för de delar av transportbranschen vi verkar i, vi har som mål att genom smarta produkter och tjänster skydda liv på vägarna. Genom hela vår historia har långsiktiga relationer värderats högt och lika så att kunna erbjuda våra kunder produkter med hög kvalitet. Vi har en privat ägare, är cirka 1300 medarbetare och vi finns förutom i Sverige också i Norge, Finland, Estland, Lettland och Litauen.*
 Är du en lagspelare med bakgrund inom innehållsmarknadsföring, med utmärkt förmåga att skriva målgruppsanpassade texter? Nu söker vi en kommunikativ stjärna som vill vara med och utveckla vår digitala närvaro. Du erbjuds en tjänst med frihet under ansvar, stöttande kollegor, spännande varumärken och möjligheten att kombinera din strukturerade sida med din kreativa ådra. Låter detta som ditt nästa drömjobb? Då ser vi fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Som Content Manager ansvarar du för att planera, skapa och optimera innehåll i våra digitala och traditionella kanaler, från strategi till publicering. Du arbetar både kreativt och datadrivet och omsätter affärsmål till relevant och engagerande kommunikation. Du arbetar med flera olika varumärken under KGK:s paraply och arbetar främst B2B.
   

  

 Du kommer att ingå i ett kompetent och engagerat marknadsteam om fem personer och i din roll har du många olika interna kontaktytor inom organisationen, allt ifrån säljare, produktchefer till utvecklare och projektledare. Totalt på marknadsavdelningen är vi 18 personer.
   

  

***"Som ledare tror jag på att vi växer bäst tillsammans, med nyfikenhet, engagemang och en stor dos arbetsglädje. Nu söker jag en content manager som vill vara med på vår spännande resa framåt och bidra till att lyfta våra varumärken till nästa nivå."***
* Pernilla, Marknadschef


**Du kommer bland annat att**
* Skapa innehåll till LinkedIn, webb, e-postutskick, kampanjer och intern kommunikation
* Skriva pressreleaser och artiklar
* Ta fram och följa upp innehållsplaner i linje med marknadsstrategin
* Samarbeta med vår interna ateljé för grafisk form, foto och video
* SEO-optimera innehåll, följa upp och analysera
* Arbeta med nyhetsbrev och automatiserade flöden i Marketing Cloud
* Arbeta med publicering i CMS-verktyg som Contentful och Wordpress
* Arbeta insikts- och datadrivet med uppföljning och analys
* Arbeta i tvärfunktionella team kring interna projekt och kampanjer


**Vi söker dig som**
* Har eftergymnasial utbildning inom kommunikation, marknadsföring eller motsvarande
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på både svenska och engelska
* Har erfarenhet av innehållsproduktion för både digitala och traditionella kanaler
* Är en skicklig skribent som kan anpassa tonalitet till olika målgrupper och varumärken
* Har kunskap i SEO och är van att arbeta med analys och optimering
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med CMS-verktyg och program för e-postutskick
* Har erfarenhet av B2B


**Det är meriterande om du har arbetat i**
* Salesforce Marketing Cloud
* Contentful och/eller Wordpress
* Google Analytics


**Vi söker dig som**
 Är strukturerad, kommunikativ och kreativ. Du är van att arbeta med flera arbetsuppgifter parallellt men tummar aldrig på kvalitén. Du har en positiv attityd och är en god lagspelare som trivs i en roll med många kontaktytor.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* En roll där du får kombinera strategi och produktion
* Ett företag i rörelse med stark framtidstro och hållbara ambitioner
* Ett kompetent och engagerat team
* Personalförmåner som bland annat fredagsfrukostar, friskvårdsbidrag, personalrabatt, kollektivavtal och tillgång till vårt moderna gym som finns i huset


**Övrig information**
* Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid
* Placeringsort: Häggvik, Sollentuna
* Omfattning: Heltid, tillsvidare, provanställning tillämpas
* Vi tillämpar ett löpande urval vilket gör att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdagen.


 Vi ser fram emot möjligheten att välkomna dig till KGK I Autoexperten.

title: AI Engineer
description:
**Role:** 
 AI Engineer
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm (Hybrid)
 



**Job Type:** 
 Permanent, Full-time
 



**Salary:** 
 Dependent on experience
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 We’re working with a fast-growing, VC-backed Fintech company on a mission to transform how modern finance teams operate. Following a recent $16M funding round, they’re scaling an AI-powered platform designed to radically simplify workflows for accountants and finance professionals. At the heart of their product is intelligent automation, redefining back-office operations through seamless technology.
 



 They’re now looking for an AI Engineer to join the team and help build smart, intuitive features that bring automation and intelligence to complex, manual workflows, delivering production-ready software that scales with real-world use.
 



  





**What You’ll Be Doing** 




 As an AI Engineer, you’ll work at the intersection of AI innovation and real-world application. Collaborating closely with engineers, designers, and product managers, you’ll design and deploy intelligent systems that drive measurable efficiency. In this role, you will:
 


* Designing and implementing intelligent automation workflows across tax, finance, and compliance domains.
* Building scalable knowledge systems for storing, retrieving, and reasoning over complex information.
* Managing end-to-end AI pipelines, including prompts, vector databases, fine-tuned models, and evaluation frameworks.
* Developing deep product and domain expertise to anticipate user needs and shape smarter solutions.



  





**What They’re Looking For** 




 They’re after someone who’s not just technically excellent, but curious, creative, and excited by complexity. Ideally, you bring:
 



  




* 2+ years of hands-on commercial experience building AI-driven products in a product-based organisation (not a consultancy or academic setting).
* Deep understanding of large language models at a foundational level - not just surface-level familiarity.
* Background in Software Engineering or Data Science, with a strong foundation in writing production-quality code and solving real-world problems.
* Strong Python skills with experience building or fine-tuning LLMs, managing model pipelines, and deploying solutions in production using modern cloud infrastructure (GCP or Azure)
* Solid grasp of embeddings, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), structured retrieval, and production-grade inference.



  





**Bonus Points For:** 



* Bonus points for contributing to or building internal tools for model evaluation and debugging.
* Experience with Typescript



  





**Why Join?** 



* Join an early stage company backed by top-tier investors and growing fast.
* Work on a product that directly impacts how thousands of professionals work.
* Collaborate with a team of ambitious, low-ego engineers, designers, and operators.
* Competitive salary and equity.
* Hybrid working model

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom Business intelligence till Knowit i Stockholm
description:
Vill du arbeta med den senaste tekniken och forma framtidens BI- och datalösningar? På Knowit Datalytics söker vi en Lösningsarkitekt som vill kombinera strategi och teknik för att utveckla innovativa analytics-lösningar – med målet att skapa en bättre och mer hållbar framtid!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig:**
* En central och verksamhetskritisk roll där du arbetar med det senaste inom Microsoft ekosystem.
* En kreativ och stöttande arbetsmiljö med fokus på din personliga och professionella utveckling.
* Konkurrenskraftigt förmånspaket med försäkring, pension, årsbonus och flexibla arbetstider.


**Om rollen och ditt team:**
 Hos Knowit Datalytics i Stockholm blir du en del av ett team om 50 skickliga specialister inom analytics och data management. Vi har en decentraliserad organisationsstruktur med snabba beslutsvägar, samtidigt som vi har kraften av en stor organisation med 4400 erfarna specialister i Sverige och Norden.
   

  

 Som lösningsarkitekt inom Business Intelligence arbetar du inom hela erbjudande- och leveranskedjan av analytics- och datamanagementlösningar, inklusive:
   

  

* Strategisk rådgivning, arkitektur och teknisk vägledning utifrån kundens behov.
* Design och implementation av analytics- och datamangement-lösningar
* Översätta behov till hållbara lösningar med kvalité och efterlevnad av IT- och säkerhetsföreskrifter


 Vi är övertygade om att AI inte bara förändrar hur vi löser tekniska problem, utan också hur vi samarbetar, kommunicerar och skapar värde. Därför söker vi dig som redan har testat, eller vill utforska, hur AI kan bidra till smartare arbetssätt och bättre resultat, både för oss själva och våra kunder.
   

  

**Om dig:**
 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har ett antal års erfarenhet inom rollen som lösningsarkitekt med erfarenhet av Microsoft data management produkter och tjänster, både onprem och i molnet. Vidare har du en teknisk bredd inom ETL och Data warehouse med ett intresse att arbeta nära tekniken.
   

  

 Som konsult har du en förmåga att samarbeta och anpassa din kommunikation för att förklara komplexa lösningar på olika nivåer. Du är lyhörd för behov, förutsättningar och möjligheter och kan omsätta dessa till tydliga mål och en effektiv leverans. Du är flytande i svenska och engelska.

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
**Sales Development Representative at Alva Labs** 




 Ever tried to catch someone's attention in a crowded room? That moment when you finally connect with the right person about something that actually matters — that’s what great SDR work feels like.
 



  





 At Alva Labs, we’re now building an AI-first approach to sales development that makes every conversation count. We help companies hire better, fairer, and smarter using science and data. And now, we’re looking for our next
 **Sales Development Representative (SDR)** 
 to drive outreach, generate high-quality leads, and shape the way modern sales is done.
 



  





**🌍 About Alva** 




 Alva Labs is a Stockholm-based SaaS company on a mission to make hiring smarter, fairer, and more human. Our platform combines psychometrics, data science, and automation to help companies find the right people — and help people find the right companies.
 



  





 We work with global enterprises and fast-growing scaleups alike, transforming how they run talent acquisition. As we now enter the next stage of our growth,
 **AI is at the center of everything we do** 
 — including how we sell.
 



  





**🎯 The Role** 




 You’ll be the first point of contact for many of our most important relationships. That means you need to be a
 **hunter at heart** 
 —relentless about finding opportunities and booking meetings—while also thoughtful and strategic enough to build trust and leave doors open for the future.
 



  





 This isn’t just about dialing more numbers or blasting more emails. You’ll join a small, cross-functional team working to
 **build a next-generation lead engine** 
 .
 



  





**🧠 What you’ll be doing** 



* Own the outbound prospecting process — from research to outreach
* Book qualified meetings that convert into long-term customers
* Iterate and improve our AI-first lead generation playbook
* Collaborate with Sales, Marketing, and Growth on campaigns
* Track performance and experiment with new channels, tactics, and tech
* Be part of shaping what AI-enhanced SDR work actually looks like



  





**🙋 ♀️ You** 




 This role is perfect for someone who’s excited about the intersection of
 **sales craft and cutting-edge tech** 
 . You likely recognize yourself in the following:
 



  




* You’ve worked as an SDR or BDR before
* You’re confident in your ability to hunt, qualify, and book quality meetings
* You take pride in the craft of sales. Skilled in the methodology and engaging confidently with stakeholders at all levels
* You’re curious about AI and eager to contribute to a modern, tech-powered sales process
* You communicate fluently in both Swedish and English
* You’re self-driven and thrive in a high-energy, fast-changing environment



  





**✨ What we offer** 




 At Alva, you’ll be part of a driven, kind, and curious team building something meaningful. Our culture is fast, fun, and flexible — and we’re AI-first not just in our product, but in how we run our business.
 



  




* A chance to become one of Europe’s most AI-enabled SDRs
* Access to world-class tools and mentorship in SaaS sales
* A team that values psychological safety, high performance, and autonomy
* A product that actually changes how people build teams



  





**📝 The hiring process** 



1. Application with screening questions.
2. Screening with Alva’s psychometric tests.
3. First interview with CMO
4. Possibility to meet a colleague
5. Case exercise (focusing on how you would do the work)
6. Background check (yes, we do take security seriously).
7. Offer, sign, and happy dance!



  





 👉
 **Sound like something for you?** 
 Apply now and help shape the future of hiring – one smart conversation at a time.

title: IAM-specialist
description:
Är du en erfaren IAM-konsult med erfarenhet och hög kompetens inom IAM-området och söker nästa utmaning? Kanske sitter du i en roll idag som IAM-specialist, IAM-analyst eller liknande och nyfiken på en ny utmaning?
 



 Då är du varmt välkommen att hänga med på Avegas framgångsresa och fortsätta att utveckla vårt Säkerhetserbjudande!
 



  





 Som IAM-konsult kommer du att arbeta i uppdrag där du t ex är ansvarig för att designa, implementera och hantera IAM-lösningar för våra kunder. Några av dina arbetsuppgifter kan sträcka sig från att analysera kundernas IAM-behov och identifiera potentiella säkerhetsrisker, utveckla och presentera skräddarsydda IAM-strategier och IAM-lösningar. Man kan jobba med allting från design och implementering, till säkerhetsanalys och riskhantering och efterlevnad. Därför lägger vi stort fokus på konsultens tekniska expertis kring olika IAM-tekniker och plattformar, samt att man även känner sig bekväm med att erbjuda teknisk support till kunder och felsöka och åtgärda tekniska problem i IAM-miljöer.
 



  





 Då Avega vill ligga i framkant med de senaste möjligheterna ser vi även att man vill hålla sig uppdaterad om de senaste IAM-trenderna och teknologierna, och att man kan bidra till utvecklingen av kundens IAM-tjänster och metoder.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Relevant högskoleutbildning inom IT-säkerhet eller motsvarande
* Gedigen erfarenhet av IAM-design, implementering och hantering
* Djupgående kunskaper om IAM-tekniker som t ex Active Directory och plattformar som Azure AD, Okta eller andra ledande IAM-plattformar
* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera och integrera IAM-verktyg och -plattformar, inklusive SSO, MFA, RBAC och PIM/PAM
* Flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med kunder och leverera konsulttjänster
* Utmärkt kommunikations- och problemlösningsförmåga



  





**Meriterande kvalifikationer** 



* Certifieringar inom IT-säkerhet och IAM är meriterande
* Konsultbakgrund eller erfarenhet inom flera branscher



 Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsplats med härliga kollegor, och sätter därför självklart vikt på de personliga egenskaperna och har som mål att vara våra medarbetares mest utvecklande arbetsplats. Denna kontinuerliga kompentensutveckling sker genom uppdraget som konsulten är med och väljer, samt genom vårt kompetensutvecklingsforum Elevate.
 



  





 Om detta låter som en arbetsplats för dig, vänligen ansök nedan. Ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Product Owner for SW Development
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun - leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation - for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.


This Position reports to:


R&D Team Lead **Your role and responsibilities**

* In this position, you will have a key role in the development of the software parts of our industrial controllers, which are central and critical parts of our product offerings.
* As product owner you will discuss and refine the requirements together with the product manager, communicate and explain the results to the agile development teams, coordinate the teams' planning based on the current backlog, continuously follow up with the teams and the release owner, report results and escalate issues.

**Qualifications for the role**

* You have a MSc in computer science or an equivalent university degree.
* You have applied agile principles and practices and acted in the role of scrum master and/or product owner for at least 3-5 years.
* You have a good understanding of software design and implementation.
* You are highly proficient in spoken and written English.
* You have good communication skills in Swedish.
* It is an advantage if you have experience in process automation, either in industrial applications or control system development.
* It is an advantage if you have experience in cyber security and/or safety certification of Software products.

**More about us**  

We develop today's and tomorrow's world-leading DCS (Distributed Control System) for process industries all over the world. Our customers include the pharmaceutical industry, mines, refineries, steel mills and power plants.


Recruiting Manager Oliver Lindberg, +46 730 676 923 will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: Peter Medin, +46 703 904 170; Ledarna: Leif Öhrberg, +46 724 64 40 16; Unionen: Mikael Hammar, +46 730 887 060. All other questions can be directed to Talent Partner Irma Leijon, +46 724 612 314.


We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.

title: Electrical Engineer
description:
**Join Crane Currency as a Electrical Engineer in TUMBA and make a difference where people truly matter.**

**Who we are:**


Crane Currency is a premier industrial technology company and a pioneer in currency manufacturing and advanced micro-optics technology for securing physical products. Yes, chances are you have our product in your wallet right now! Our sophisticated equipment and software leverage proprietary core capabilities with detection and sensing technologies. Around the world, our customers trust us to anticipate their needs with innovative, reliable, and high-quality currency & authentication solutions and services—just as they have for generations. Learn more at www.cranecurrency.com

**How you will make an impact:**  

In your role as an Electrical Engineer at Crane AB, you will maintain and optimize our facility's electrical systems to ensure reliability and efficiency. You will troubleshoot and modify systems, document switchgear inspections, and develop a 5-year maintenance budget. Additionally, you will participate in projects, support activities, implement continuous improvement and LEAN methodologies, manage materials and subcontractors, maintain professional competence, and initiate supplier selection processes.


In your role you will also:

* Update facility registers as well as PM templates and work instructions.  

Together with the facility function, define reinvestment needs within electrical power.  

Participate in investigations and projects within electrical power as a requirements setter.  

Perform troubleshooting, modification, and programming of control system code.  

Ensure that switchgear inspections are carried out according to plan and documented.  

Develop a 5-year budget plan for the maintenance of electrical equipment.  

Receive orders for corrective work via phone from internal customers during day shifts and on-call duty.  

Operate according to Crane AB's policies and management system for the SMAK areas: Safety, Environment, Work Environment, and Quality.

 **Knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role:**


Required:

* Technical education at the high school level in electrical engineering, 3 years, with a focus on industrial electrical engineering or equivalent competence. Documented expertise in electrical systems
* 3-5 years of experience in performing qualified maintenance work within a high-performance industrial environment.
* AutoCAD
* Reading and understanding electrical and instrumentation drawings
* **Swedish Fluency both verbal and written is a requirement**
* English Fluency both verbal and written is a requirement

**Meritorious:**

* Experience in LEAN work and continuous improvements.
* Troubleshooting in various control systems, e.g., ABB 800xA , Siemens TIA Portal, Honeywell. Knowledge of high voltage and AutoCAD
* Writing RFQ (Request for Quotation)
* Project planning
* Electrical authorization

 **Benefits**

**How we will care for you:**


We offer top-notch medical benefits including a wellness allowance and reimbursement for medicines and medical care, opportunities for personal development, community engagement activities, competitive compensation, vacation, parental leave, and multiple tiers of retirement plans. Discover more about our benefits here **https://www.cranecurrency.com/careers/benefits/**

 **What drives our team:**


We are a passionate team of 1,200 creators and problem solvers, united by our purpose, we give people confidence every day in moments that matter. This comes to life through our Shared Values:

* People Matter
* Do the Right Thing
* Trusted Partner
* Innovate for Growth
* Always Improving


Learn more about our values and culture: **https://www.cranecurrency.com/careers/life-at-crane-currency/**


You can also check us out at: **https://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/Crane-Currency-Reviews-E1187198.htm**

**Where we are:**


Your role is in Tumba, Stockholm, located in the historic Tumba Bruk area, ten-minute walking distance from the train station, 30 km south of Stockholm, and about 20 minutes from Stockholm Central Station. Check out what makes Tumba a great place to live and work here: **https://www.cranecurrency.com/media/12rbruyv/0133-ex55-crane-currency-tumba-sweden-site-location-package-october-2024-lr.pdf**


-


Crane Currency is a drug free workplace.


Crane NXT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, or national origin or any other characteristic protected under applicable local law.

**#CCY**

**#ONSITE**

**#LI-KP1**

title: Research Engineer in Machine Learning
description:
**Halmstad University**


Work at a University where different perspectives meet!

  

Halmstad University adds value, drives innovation and prepares people and society for the future. Ever since the start beginning in 1983, innovation and collaboration with society have characterised the University’s education and research. Today, the University has a wide range of educational programmes, about 14,000 students and 700 employees. The research is internationally renowned and is conducted in multidisciplinary innovation and research environments within the University’s two focus areas: Health Innovation and Smart Cities and Communities. The University participates actively in the development of society through extensive and high-profile collaboration with both industry and the public sector.


More information about working at Halmstad University: https://hh.se/english/about-the-university/vacant-positions.html

 **The School of Information Technology**


Halmstad University’s School of Information Technology (ITE) is a renowned multi-disciplinary institution with around 155 employees from 20 different countries. ITE is internationally recognised for its applied research and collaborative initiatives, focusing on smart technology and its practical applications.


Within ITE, our students and researchers engage in diverse areas of study, including electronics, AI, information-driven healthcare, autonomous vehicles, social robotics, and digital design. We offer a comprehensive range of educational programmes, ranging from undergraduate to doctoral levels, as well as professional development opportunities.


Research is conducted within the University’s research programmes, especially Information Driven Care (IDC), Re-Imagining Future Smart Living – beyond the Living Lab (REBEL), Learning in a Digitalised Society (LeaDS) and the Future Industry Research Programme (FIRP).


ITE is home to Leap for Life, an innovation centre for information-driven care, as well as the Electronics Centre in Halmstad (ECH), a collaborative space for electronic development.


For more information about the School of Information Technology: hh.se/ite-en

 **Description**


This is a permanent position and requires a combination of many different skills related to software development, machine learning and programming, but goes well beyond the typical scope of such jobs through the expectation of research experience in machine learning. Therefore, we need a person who is creative, open to new challenges, and passionate about delivering high quality results. The work include the following tasks:

* Contribute with software development in several different industry collaboration projects, mainly related to healthcare applications
* Perform data science experiments to extract knowledge from datasets
* Develop solutions based on machine learning, particularly deep learning
* Support the project team(s) in the various related projects, ranging from software documentation to validation and testing of methods
* Data engineering work including relational database design, structured query optimization, and data extraction pipelines, leveraging SQL and ETL frameworks for analytical and machine learning applications
* Teaching in foundational courses at the university, such as programming, can be included

 **Qualifications**

* M.S. degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Machine learning or related discipline.
* A strong knowledge of machine learning is required (especially meriting is skills and knowledge in deep learning) with methods such as CNN, RNN, LSTM, Transformers and Autoencoders.
* Excellent programming skills, analytical problem solving and organizational abilities are required.

  

* Programming skills in Python is required, skills in other programming languages and software development experience is a plus.

  

* Teaching experience in these areas is also a merit.
* Proficiency in Swedish language is a merit.

 **Salary**  

Salary is to be determined by negotiation. The application should include a statement of the salary level required by the candidate.

 **Application**  

Applications should be sent via Halmstad University's recruitment system Varbi (see link on this page).  

How to design your application

 **General Information:**


We value the qualities that gender balance and diversity bring to our organisation. We therefore welcome applicants with different backgrounds, gender, functionality and, not least, life experience.  

  

The working language is English and no knowledge of Swedish is required to start working at the University. Also for daily life, English is spoken widely and Sweden has the highest English Proficiency index in the world. Of course, it’s advisable that the employee learn Swedish.


Halmstad is a popular summer destination located on the Swedish west coast. It is situated halfway between two cosmopolitan areas: the Copenhagen-Malmö-Lund area and the Gothenburg area, making it a well-connected, yet a pleasantly calm place to live. Halmstad can be reached by a direct train connection from the Copenhagen Kastrup Airport, as well as other local airports (e.g., Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, Halmstad, and Helsingborg/Ängelholm airports).
